task_data.prompt: comprei um terreno com uma casa velha que eu quero demolir. preciso de autorização da prefeitura pra isso?
task_data.golden_answer:
Sim. Para demolir é preciso obter a *Licença de Demolição* emitida pela Secretaria Municipal de Urbanismo (SMU).
 Como pedir:
 
 1. Acesse https://planejamentourbano.prefeitura.rio e clique em Requerimento e Licença → “Construção, Reforma ou Demolição”.
 2. Preencha o requerimento, anexe ART/RRT, Registro do Imóvel, fotos e demais documentos exigidos.
 3. Pague o DARM gerado e protocole on-line ou entregue a via impressa na unidade SMU indicada.
 
 Detalhes completos: https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10834932590491-Informa%C3%A7%C3%A3o…

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Sim, você precisa de autorização da Prefeitura para demolir um imóvel no Rio de Janeiro. É necessário obter uma *Licença de Demolição*.

*Como solicitar:*
1.  Acesse o *Portal Carioca Digital* e utilize o sistema "Requerimento Online".
2.  Um engenheiro ou arquiteto qualificado deve ser responsável pelo projeto e execução.

Demolir sem licença pode gerar *multas e embargo* da obra.

Para mais detalhes ou dúvidas, você pode ligar para a *Central 1746* ou usar o aplicativo *1746 Rio*.

Gostaria de ajuda para encontrar o serviço de "Requerimento Online" no Portal Carioca Digital?

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact: Authorization for Property Demolition in Rio de Janeiro**

**Date of Search:** August 11, 2025

To obtain authorization for demolishing a property in Rio de Janeiro, a formal process involving the municipal government is required. This process ensures that demolitions are conducted in compliance with technical, environmental, and safety regulations [1]. Demolishing a property without the necessary permit can lead to fines, embargoes, and legal complications [1].

**Process for Obtaining Demolition Authorization:**

The primary pathway for obtaining a demolition license is through the Portal Carioca Digital, specifically via the "Requerimento Online" system [2]. The property owner must be registered on this platform to initiate the request [2].

Key steps and requirements include:

1.  **Ownership Verification:** The applicant must be the legal owner of the property. Proof of ownership, such as a property registration certificate (Certidão de Registro de imóveis), is a mandatory document.
2 [2].  **Professional Responsibility:** The demolition project must be overseen by a qualified professional, such as an engineer or architect, who is registered with the relevant regional council (CREA/RJ or CAU/RJ). This [2] professional is responsible for the project and the execution of the demolition, often requiring an Anotação de Responsabilidade Técnica (ART) or Registro de Responsabilidade Técnica (RRT).
3.   [2]**Project Submission:** A detailed demolition project must be prepared and submitted. This project should outline the methodology for demolition, identify potential risks, and specify protective measures for surrounding areas and properties.
4.   [1]**Documentation:** Specific documents are required for the application, which may include:
    *   Two 5x12 cm photographs of the property, particularly for demolitions in specific planning areas or for properties built before 1937.
     [2]*   Copies of the professional identification (CREA/RJ or CAU/RJ) of the responsible project and execution professionals.
     [2]*   A declaration as per Article 3 of Decree 23235 of 04/08/2003.
     [2]*   Proof of property ownership (Certidão de Registro de imóveis).
    *  [2]  In some cases, environmental permits may be necessary, especially if the demolition generates hazardous waste or is located in environmentally sensitive areas.
5.  **Application [3] Submission:** The application and all supporting documents are typically submitted digitally through the Requerimento Online system on the Portal Carioca Digital. For existing [2] processes, requests can be submitted through the same system.
6.  **Review [3] and Approval:** The municipal authority will review the submitted project and documentation. If approved, a demolition license (Alvará de Demolição) will be issued, specifying timelines for the commencement and completion of the work. The expected [1] timeframe for license issuance is approximately 30 days.
7.  **Post [2]-Demolition Acceptance:** After the demolition is completed, an acceptance of the demolition works may be issued, confirming the finalization of the process.

**Important [2] Considerations:**

*   **Total Demolition:** The demolition license is generally issued for the entirety of the property. Partial demolitions are not covered by a standard demolition license and must be handled as a modification with a decrease in area.
*   **Legal [2] Compliance:** It is crucial to adhere to all legal requirements and obtain the necessary permits before commencing any demolition work to avoid penalties.
*   **Irregular [1] Constructions:** The Prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro actively conducts operations to demolish illegal constructions and enforce urbanistic regulations. Properties with unregularized expansions or constructions may face demolition if they do not comply with the law or pursue regularization options like the "Lei da Mais Valia".

The process [4] is managed by the Secretaria Municipal de Desenvolvimento Urbano e Licenciamento (SMDU). For inquiries [4] or assistance, citizens can contact the central service by dialing 1746 or using the 1746 Rio application. [2]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [exame.com](https://exame.com/mercado-imobiliario/o-que-e-o-alvara-de-demolicao-e-como-solicita-lo/)
 - [2] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/licenca-de-demolicao-de-edificacao/)
 - [3] [rio.rj.gov.br](https://requerimentossmu.rio.rj.gov.br/)
 - [4] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/grupo/licenciar-obras/)

Você deve abrir uma solicitação no 1746 pelo serviço *Fiscalização de obstáculo fixo na calçada*. A Prefeitura enviará equipe que pode notificar, multar o responsável ou remover a obra.
 
 Como pedir:
 
 * Acesse https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10276024066459-Fiscaliza%C3%A7%C3%A3o-de-obst%C3%A1culo-fixo-na-cal%C3%A7ada
 * Clique em “Solicitar anonimamente” (ou faça login)
 * Informe: endereço completo, tipo de obra/obstáculo, dias / horários em que ocorre e fotos, se tiver.
 
 *Prazo de resposta: até 15 dias úteis.*

**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** August 11, 2025

**Research Topic:** Denunciar obra irregular prefeitura rio de janeiro

**Summary:**

To report an irregular construction in the city of Rio de Janeiro, citizens can utilize several official channels provided by the municipal government. The Central 1746 is a primary point of contact for receiving such denouncements and operates 24 hours a day, seven days a week [1]. This service is also accessible via WhatsApp, where citizens can send messages, including audio and images, to the number 98909-1746 to report irregular construction activities [2]. The Portal Carioca Digital also serves as a platform for reporting irregular construction, specifically mentioning fiscalization of works in invaded areas and communities [3].

The Central 1746 handles a wide range of urbanism-related inquiries and denouncements, including those concerning unlicensed, embargoed, or unplastered constructions, as well as "puxadinhos" (unauthorized additions) and constructions in communities [1]. The scope of these fiscalizations covers various types of constructions, including loteamentos (subdivisions), constructions on public land, new house constructions (with or without deforestation), and works on listed buildings [2].

For citizens seeking to make a denouncement, it is advised to provide as much identifying information as possible about the location of the irregular work, such as the address, and any details that can help identify the property or owner [2]. The information gathered through these channels is then forwarded to the relevant divisions within the municipal government, such as the Secretaria Municipal de Ordem Pública (SEOP) or the Divisão de Fiscalização de Obras (DIFOP), for verification and action.

The [3] municipal government emphasizes its commitment to collaborative and participatory management, utilizing popular tools like WhatsApp to facilitate citizen engagement in identifying and addressing urban irregularities. The [2] 1746 service is available via phone, its own mobile application, and through the websites www.1746.rio.gov.br and http://carioca.rio.rj.gov.br. The [2] Ouvidoria (Ombudsman) serves as a second instance for complaints regarding services that were not resolved within the expected timeframe or quality. [1]

2.  **WhatsApp**: Envie uma mensagem para o número da Central 1746. Você pode incluir áudios e imagens para ajudar na identificação.

Sua denúncia pode ser feita de forma *totalmente anônima*. Após o registro, você receberá um número de protocolo para acompanhar o andamento da fiscalização.

### Research Artifact

**Date of Search:** August 11, 2025

**Research Topic:** Denunciar obra irregular prefeitura Rio de Janeiro

**Summary:**

To report an irregular construction in Rio de Janeiro, citizens can utilize several official channels provided by the city hall. The Central 1746 is a primary point of contact for receiving such complaints and operates 24 hours a day, seven days a week [1]. This service is also accessible via WhatsApp, where citizens can send messages, including audio and images, with detailed information about the irregular construction to identify the location accurately [2]. The Central 1746 also handles inquiries related to the Municipal Secretariat of Urbanism [1].

The Portal Carioca Digital is another platform where citizens can report irregular constructions, specifically mentioning fiscalization of works in invaded areas or unauthorized constructions [3]. The Secretaria Municipal de Ordem Pública (SEOP) is involved in combating irregular constructions, working in cooperation with the Public Prosecutor's Office to address urban disorder and punish those responsible. [4]

For specific issues related to professional practice in engineering, agronomy, and geosciences, the CREA-RJ is the responsible body for fiscalization. However, CREA-RJ clarifies that issues such as safety risks in buildings, recuances of works, invasion of neighboring land, and delivery of permits fall under the purview of the Municipal Secretariat of Urbanism or the Civil Defense, not CREA-RJ. [4]

The Municipal Secretariat of Urban Development and Licensing (SMDU) also provides channels for information and denouncements, with their headquarters located at Rua Afonso Cavalcanti, 455, Cidade Nova, Rio de Janeiro/RJ. [3] The general phone number for doubts, services, information, or denouncements is 1746, or (21) 3460-1746 for areas outside of Rio de Janeiro. [3]

When making a report, it is crucial to provide as much information as possible, including the location, address, and owner's name, to facilitate the investigation. [2] The types of constructions that can be reported include those without licenses, those under embargo, those without signage, unauthorized extensions ("puxadinhos"), and constructions in communities, as well as middle or high-class constructions, subdivisions, constructions on public land, new houses with or without deforestation, and works on listed buildings. [2]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [prefeitura.rio](https://prefeitura.rio/cidade/central-1746-recebe-denuncias-de-obras-irregulares/)

task_data.prompt: terminei de construir minha casa. agora preciso de um tal de habite-se. como eu tiro esse documento?
task_data.golden_answer:
*Habite-se* (Certidão de Conclusão de Obra) é emitido pela Secretaria Municipal de Urbanismo (SMU).
 
 Passo a passo:
 
 * Acesse https://requerimentossmu.rio.rj.gov.br/, faça login e escolha *Legalização de obra concluída*.
 * Anexe projeto simplificado, ART/RRT, termos de responsabilidade e registro do imóvel (PDF).
 * Gere e pague o DARM (taxa).
 * Unifamiliar/bifamiliar: tudo on-line. Demais: leve requerimento, docs e DARM pago à unidade SMU indicada.
 * Após vistoria, baixe a certidão no mesmo site.
 
 Consulta de certidões já emitidas: https://consultahabiteses.rio.gov.br/

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! O *Habite-se* é um documento emitido pela Prefeitura que comprova que sua construção está de acordo com as normas municipais e pode ser habitada.

*Como tirar:*
1.  **Reúna a documentação**: Inclui o *Alvará de construção aprovado*, *Certidão negativa de débitos municipais*, *Planta baixa atualizada e aprovada*, e um *Laudo técnico* de engenheiro/arquiteto.
2.  **Protocolo**: Faça a solicitação formal na Prefeitura.
3.  **Vistoria**: Uma equipe da Prefeitura fará uma vistoria para verificar se a obra está conforme o projeto aprovado.
4.  **Emissão**: Se tudo estiver correto, o *Habite-se* será emitido.

*Peculiaridade no Rio*: Pode ser exigido o plantio de árvores, conforme a Lei Municipal nº 613/1984. O número de mudas varia com o tipo e tamanho da construção. Para isso, é preciso iniciar um processo administrativo na *Fundação Parques e Jardins (FPJ)*.

Você pode encontrar mais informações e consultar o status do seu *Habite-se* no *Portal Carioca Digital* ou no *Portal Rio 1746* (1746.rio).

Para mais detalhes sobre o processo, você pode consultar o *Portal Carioca Digital* em carioca.rio/objetivo/obter-habite-se-de-edificacao/.

Gostaria de saber como iniciar o processo para o plantio de árvores, caso seja necessário?

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact: Obtaining a Habite-se in Rio de Janeiro**

**Date of Search:** August 11, 2025

The "habite-se" is an official document issued by the city hall of Rio de Janeiro that certifies a construction has been completed in accordance with municipal regulations and is fit for occupancy [1]. It is also known by other names such as Auto de Conclusão de Construção, Auto de Vistoria, Certificado de Conclusão de Obra, Alvará de Utilização, or Carta de Habitação. This document [1] is crucial for legalizing a construction, facilitating real estate transactions like sales and financing, and avoiding potential fines. Without [2] a "habite-se," a property may face restrictions on its sale, financing, or even the connection of essential public services such as water and electricity.

**Process [3] for Obtaining a Habite-se:**
The general procedure for obtaining a "habite-se" involves the responsible party, typically the owner or constructor, gathering the necessary documentation and submitting a formal request to the city hall. Following [1] the submission, a site inspection will be conducted by the relevant municipal department to ensure the construction complies with the approved project plans and all applicable regulations. task_data.prompt: eu fiz um puxadinho na minha casa faz tempo, sem licença. quero legalizar agora. como eu faço?
task_data.golden_answer:
Para legalizar o puxadinho:
 
 1. Entre em requerimentossmu.rio.rj.gov.br.
 2. Abra novo processo > Construção > *Legalização de construção*.
 3. Anexe: projeto simplificado, *ART/RRT*, termos de responsabilidade e registro do imóvel.
 4. Gere e pague o DARM; leve requerimento impresso e documentos à unidade da SMU indicada.
 5. Acompanhe a análise e, ao final, receba a licença/Habite-se.
 
 *A Mais Valia* (descontos) terminou em 14/01/2019; hoje há contrapartida e possíveis multas.
 
 Guia oficial: https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10834765847451

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Para legalizar o "puxadinho" na sua casa no Rio de Janeiro, você pode usar a *Lei dos Puxadinhos*. Essa lei permite a regularização de construções informais mediante o pagamento de uma taxa à Prefeitura.

*Como funciona:*
1.  **Prazo:** Para obras já construídas, você tem até *30 de junho de 2026* para solicitar a regularização.
2.  **Solicitação:** O processo é feito online, pelo sistema *Requerimento Online* da Secretaria Municipal de Urbanismo (SMU).
3.  **Documentos:** Você precisará de:
    - Comprovante das dimensões do imóvel (como o RGI).
    - Um projeto arquitetônico da construção.
    - Documentação de profissionais responsáveis (arquiteto ou engenheiro).
4.  **Taxa:** Será calculada uma taxa ("contrapartida" ou "mais-valia") com base nas características da obra. Em algumas áreas, pode ser parcelada em até 60 vezes.

Para iniciar o processo e ter acesso a todos os detalhes, você pode buscar mais informações nos canais oficiais da Prefeitura do Rio, como o site da SMU ou o portal de atendimento *1746*.

**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** August 11, 2025

**Research Topic:** Regularização de obra puxadinho prefeitura rio de janeiro

The regularization of informal building extensions, commonly known as "puxadinhos," in Rio de Janeiro is facilitated by municipal legislation, popularly referred to as the "Lei dos Puxadinhos." This framework allows for the licensing and legalization of constructions and additions to existing buildings through the payment of a fee to the municipality, a mechanism often termed "mais-valia".
 [1]
**Key Legislative Updates and Deadlines:**
The "Lei dos Puxadinhos" has undergone recent legislative changes. Initially approved in 2023 and effective from July 2024, its validity expired in December 2024. A [1] new law, Projeto de Lei Complementar 2/25, was approved by the Municipal Chamber of Rio de Janeiro on May 15, 2025, extending and modifying the rules for regularization. Under [1] these updated provisions, the deadlines for submitting regularization requests are:
*   For projects of works not yet initiated: December 1, 2025.
 [1]*   For works already constructed by the law's publication date: June 30, 2026.
 [1]
**Scope of Regularization:**
The "Lei dos Puxadinhos" permits the regularization of various types of construction and modifications, including:
*   **Building extensions**: This covers the construction of an additional floor of a rooftop, provided it does not exceed half the area of the last existing floor. It [1] also allows for horizontal expansions in uncovered areas at any level and on legalized or planned rooftop floors.
 [2]*   **Transformations of building use**: Hotels can be converted into residential buildings, with the exception of those located on the city's waterfront.
 [1]*   **Height equalization**: Properties in specific neighborhoods, such as Catete and Glória, are permitted to be extended to match the height of adjacent taller buildings.
* [1]   **Commercial and non-residential expansions**: Buildings used for commercial purposes can expand their spaces for shops and services, respecting maximum height regulations. Companies [1] with legally recognized properties can also expand their structures.
* [1]   **Balcony modifications**: Homeowners can close balconies, subject to a fee, as long as the enclosed space is not divided into new rooms. Balconies [3] can also occupy setback areas, provided they do not have windows facing neighbors and a fee is paid.
* [3]   **Commercial property enhancements**: Mezzanines can be incorporated into commercial areas up to the limits defined by the building code, and balconies are not counted towards the calculation of built area for commercial properties.

 [3]**Process and Requirements:**
To regularize a "puxadinho," property owners typically need to submit an application through the online "Requerimento Online" system managed by the Municipal Secretariat of Urbanism (SMU). The [3] process generally requires the following documentation:
*   Proof of property dimensions, such as a Property Registration Certificate (Certidão de Ônus Reais - RGI) or an approved subdivision project.
*   [4] An architectural project detailing the construction.
*   [4] Documentation from the responsible professionals (architects or engineers), such as their CREA/CAU cards.
*   [4] A technical analysis and a "Laudo de Contrapartida" (fee assessment) will be generated, calculating the amount payable to the municipality based on the building's characteristics, area, and local property values.

**Payment [5] and Financial Aspects:**
The regularization process involves paying a "contrapartida" or "mais-valia" fee to the municipality. For [3] properties located in the North and West Zones of Rio de Janeiro, this fee can be paid in installments, potentially up to 60 times without interest. Historically [1], discounts have been offered for upfront payments, though current specific discount percentages are not detailed in the most recent search results.

**Exemptions [3]:**
Certain entities are exempt from paying the regularization fee. These include public facilities of collective interest and areas used by religious temples that benefit from tax immunity.

**Consequences [2] of Non-Compliance:**
Failure to regularize unauthorized constructions can lead to significant penalties. Property owners found to have unlicensed works are subject to municipal inspection, which can result in notifications, fines, inclusion in active debt records, and even demolition of the irregular structures. Recent [1] enforcement actions in areas like Barra da Tijuca have seen demolitions of commercial properties that had expressed interest in regularization but failed to complete the process, often due to substantial outstanding debts.

**Official [2] Information Channels:**
For detailed information and to initiate the regularization process, citizens are directed to the official channels of the Rio de Janeiro City Hall, including the SMU website and the 1746 citizen service portal. [1]

task_data.prompt: vou fazer uma obra grande no meu ap, quebrar parede e tudo. preciso de alvará da prefeitura pra isso?
task_data.golden_answer:
*Não precisa*, se a obra for *interna*, não ampliar área e o prédio não for *tombado*. A Lei Complementar 270/2024 (art. 681 §1º IV) dispensa Licença de Obras nesses casos. 
 
 Antes de iniciar:
 
 * OK do condomínio.
 * Se derrubar parede estrutural, contrate engenheiro (RRT/ART).
 * Providencie caçamba regular.
 
 Para aumento de área, mudança de fachada ou imóvel tombado, solicite a Licença de Obras no portal SMU: https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10834932590491-Informa%C3%A7%C3%B5es-sobre-Licen%C3%A7a-de-obras-de-modifica%C3%A7%C3%A3o-reconstru%C3%A7%C3%A3o-reforma-ou-demoli%C3%A7%C3%A3o-de-edifica%C3%A7%C3%A3o

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Sim, para uma obra grande no seu apartamento no Rio de Janeiro que envolva quebrar paredes, especialmente se forem estruturais, você *precisa* de um alvará da Prefeitura.

Isso é necessário para reformas que alteram a estrutura, o volume ou que adicionam/removem áreas construídas.

*Como funciona:*
1.  *Contrate um profissional:* Um engenheiro ou arquiteto deve fazer o projeto técnico da obra.
2.  *ART/RRT:* O profissional emitirá a Anotação de Responsabilidade Técnica (ART) ou Registro de Responsabilidade Técnica (RRT).
3.  *Envie o projeto:* O projeto e outros documentos são enviados à Prefeitura. O processo é feito online pelo *Portal Carioca Digital*.
4.  *Análise e Aprovação:* A Prefeitura analisa o projeto e, se aprovado, emite o *Alvará de Reforma* ou *Licença de Obras*.

*Documentos comuns:*
- Projeto técnico feito por engenheiro/arquiteto.
- ART ou RRT.
- Comprovante de propriedade.
- Pagamento de taxas.

Fazer obras sem licença pode gerar multas e embargos. Para mais detalhes e para iniciar o processo, acesse o *Portal Carioca Digital* ou entre em contato com a *Central 1746*.

Você gostaria que eu buscasse mais informações sobre como iniciar o processo no Portal Carioca Digital ou no 1746?

**Topic:** Alvará para quebrar parede em apartamento na Prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro

To undertake renovations in an apartment in Rio de Janeiro that involve breaking a wall, obtaining a permit from the Prefeitura (City Hall) is often necessary, particularly if the wall is structural or if the modification affects the building's integrity or systems. [1] Reforms that alter the structure, vertical compartmentalization, building volume, or involve adding or removing built areas generally require an "Alvará de Execução" or "Alvará de Reforma".

The [1] process for obtaining such a permit typically involves several steps and requires specific documentation:

1.  **Engage a Professional:** It is essential to hire a qualified professional, such as an engineer or architect, to prepare a technical project for the proposed renovation. This [1] professional will be responsible for the design and supervision of the work.
2.  **Obtain ART or RRT:** The professional must issue an "Anotação de Responsabilidade Técnica" (ART) or "Registro de Responsabilidade Técnica" (RRT), which is a document that formalizes their responsibility for the project and guarantees its technical soundness.
3.  **Submit [1] the Project:** The technical project, along with other required documents, must be submitted to the Prefeitura. In Rio de Janeiro, this process is largely digitized through platforms like the "Requerimento Online" on the Portal Carioca Digital (requerimentossmu.rio.rj.gov.br). The "LICIN [2] - Licenciamento Integrado" system is in place to streamline the approval and issuance of construction permits, aiming for a 30-day turnaround for eligible projects.
4.  **Project [3] Analysis:** City engineers will review the submitted project to ensure compliance with urban planning and building codes. They may [1] issue a "comunique-se" if additional information or clarifications are needed.
5.  **Permit [1] Issuance:** Upon approval, the "Alvará de Reforma" or "Licença de Obras" will be issued, allowing the renovation to commence.
6.  **Post [1]-Construction:** After the completion of the work, a "habite-se" (certificate of occupancy or completion) may be required to legalize the alterations.

**Key Documentation [1] Typically Required:**

*   A detailed technical project prepared by a registered engineer or architect.
*   An ART [1] (Anotação de Responsabilidade Técnica) or RRT (Registro de Responsabilidade Técnica) signed by the responsible professional.
*   Proof of property [1] ownership, such as a "Certidão de Registro de Imóveis".
*   In specific [2] cases, photographs of the property may be requested.

The 1746 service can [2] also be contacted for guidance on permit-related inquiries.

It is important to [2] note that performing structural modifications without the necessary permits can lead to fines, embargoes, and potential demolition orders.

*   **1746 Rio:** For [2] information and service requests
*   **Prefeitura da [2] Cidade do Rio de Janeiro:** www.rio.rj.gov.br

The search results [5] indicate that internal reforms not affecting the structure or built area might not require a permit, but any intervention involving breaking a wall, especially if it's load-bearing, necessitates proper authorization. Consulting with a [1] qualified professional and the municipal authorities is crucial to determine the exact requirements for a specific renovation project.

task_data.prompt: eu posso abrir uma pequena oficina na garagem da minha casa? ou o bairro é só residencial? onde eu vejo isso?
task_data.golden_answer:
*Passo a passo*
 
 * Entre em https://mapas.rio.rj.gov.br, abra *Consultas Urbanas*, digite seu endereço e veja a zona urbana (ZR, ZUM, etc.) e a lista de usos permitidos para o imóvel.
 * Se “oficina” aparecer como permitida, faça a *Consulta Prévia de Local (CPL)* no Portal Carioca Digital: https://carioca.rio/servicos/consulta-previa-de-local/ (Alvarás e Licenças → Iniciar nova consulta). Informe endereço, inscrição do IPTU e CNAE da atividade; o sistema confirma a viabilidade.
 * Com a CPL aprovada, solicite o *Alvará de Licença para Estabelecimento* (para atividades de baixo risco, é o “Alvará Já”). A emissão só ocorre se o zoneamento permitir a atividade.
 * Se a zona do imóvel for exclusivamente residencial (ZR), a CPL será negada e a oficina não poderá funcionar na garagem.

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Para saber se você pode abrir uma pequena oficina na garagem da sua casa, é preciso verificar o *zoneamento* da sua região. As leis de zoneamento da Prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro definem quais tipos de atividades (residenciais, comerciais, industriais) são permitidas em cada bairro ou rua.

A melhor forma de verificar isso é através do *Portal Carioca Digital* da Prefeitura. Lá você pode fazer uma *Consulta Prévia de Local*.

*Como verificar:*
1.  Acesse o *Portal Carioca Digital*.
2.  Procure pela opção "Consulta Prévia de Local".
3.  Informe o endereço completo da sua casa.

Essa consulta indicará se a atividade de oficina é permitida no seu endereço, de acordo com a legislação de uso e ocupação do solo. Você também pode consultar a "Legislação Bairro a Bairro" no mesmo portal para entender as regras gerais de zoneamento da sua área.

tool_return.text:
### Research Artifact: Rio de Janeiro Zoning for Commercial and Residential Use

**Date of Search:** August 11, 2025

The zoning regulations in Rio de Janeiro define parameters for land use and occupation, aiming for balanced and sustainable urban development. These regulations are primarily governed by the City's Master Plan (Plano Diretor) and the Law of Land Parceling, Use, and Occupation of the Soil (Lei de Uso e Ocupação do Solo - LUOS). The [1] most recent comprehensive legislation referenced is Lei Complementar (LC) 270/2024, which establishes the macrozonas, zones, and subzones of the city and outlines permitted uses and occupation parameters.
 [2]
**Key Legislation and Resources:**

*   **Lei Complementar (LC) 270/2024:** This law, published on January 18, 2024, revises the Master Plan for Sustainable Urban Development of the Municipality of Rio de Janeiro. It defines the macrozonas, zones, and subzones, and sets the parameters for land parceling, soil occupation, and permitted uses within the municipality. The [2] DATA RIO platform provides access to maps and data services related to this zoning.
 [2]*   **Lei de Uso e Ocupação do Solo (LUOS):** This law consolidates principles and guidelines for the use and occupation of urban space. It aims to ensure balanced development, considering existing and planned infrastructure, environmental restrictions, landscape, and cultural environment. The [1] LUOS also standardizes zoning and parameters for land, defines important commercial and service centers based on accessibility and economic impact, and sets criteria for sidewalk occupation.
*  [1]  **Portal Carioca Digital:** This platform offers various services related to urban planning and legislation, including a "Consulta Prévia de Local" (Prior Local Consultation) that allows users to check if a proposed economic activity is permitted according to zoning and land use laws. It also [3] provides access to "Legislação Bairro a Bairro" (Neighborhood-by-Neighborhood Legislation) through a georeferenced application for consulting land use and occupation laws and issuing Urban Information Reports (RIU).
*   * [3]*DATA RIO:** This platform serves as a repository for urban data, including zoning maps and services based on LC 270/2024, providing a visual representation of the city's zoning.

**General [2] Principles of Zoning:**

*   **Purpose:** Zoning aims to define what is most suitable for each area of the city, considering its specific characteristics and needs, to ensure adequate land use, social and economic development, environmental protection, and improved quality of life.
*   * [1]*Zoning Categories:** The municipal territory is divided into zones, which are characterized by the predominance, diversity, or intensity of various uses and economic, social, and cultural activities. These zones and subzones contain the set of urbanistic indices and parameters that control urban density and construction limits.
*   * [4]*Commercial and Residential Use:** The legislation specifies permitted uses for different zones. For instance, Lei Ordinária nº 1.638/1990, which applies to specific neighborhoods, outlines different Residential Zones (ZR-2, ZR-3, ZR-5) and states that commercial and service uses are adapted according to the zone in which they are located. Recent legislation [3], such as LC 232/2021, also addresses the transformation of use between commercial and residential, with specific conditions and potential contrapartidas.

**Recent [2] Developments and Regularization:**

*   **Lei Complementar (LC) 274/2024 and PLC 2/25:** These laws have introduced special conditions for licensing and regularizing constructions and building additions. They include instruments like "Mais Valia" (for regularizing existing overages) and "Mais Valerá" (for prior licensing of irregular constructions), both requiring payment of a contrapartida to the municipality. These laws have extended deadlines for regularization and also address specific conversions, such as prohibiting the conversion of beachfront hotels into residential buildings in certain areas.

For detailed [5] information on specific zones and permitted uses, consulting the official zoning maps and the "Legislação Bairro a Bairro" on the Portal Carioca Digital or DATA RIO is recommended.

**Sources:**
 - [1] [arcgis.com](https://datariov2-pcrj.hub.arcgis.com/search?tags=zoneamento)
 - [2] [data.rio](https://www.data.rio/maps/PCRJ::zoneamento-urbano-vigente/about)
 - [3] [camara.rj.gov.br](https://mail.camara.rj.gov.br/APL/Legislativos/contlei.nsf/b24a2da5a077847c032564f4005d4bf2/32f56cc4497d5dc3032576ac00738af1?OpenDocument)
 - [4] [data.rio](https://www.data.rio/maps/f23e9caccb8f45edb20c1f673f21d5b8)
 - [5] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/termos/zoneamento/)

task_data.prompt: montaram uma barraca de comida na calçada aqui da rua, mal da pra gente passar. como eu denuncio?
task_data.golden_answer:
Para denunciar uma barraca de comida que ocupa a calçada:
 
 * Acesse o serviço *Fiscalização de comércio ambulante* no Portal 1746: https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10221375373467-Informa%C3%A7%C3%A3o-sobre-Fiscaliza%C3%A7%C3%A3o-de-com%C3%A9rcio-ambulante
 * Clique em “Solicitar anonimamente” (ou entre com seu cadastro) e informe: endereço completo, dias/horários em que a barraca funciona e tipo de atividade.
 * Envie a solicitação; você receberá um número de protocolo para acompanhar o andamento.
 
 *Prazo de atendimento:* até 30 dias corridos.

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Você pode denunciar a barraca de comida que está ocupando a calçada pela *Central 1746*.

*Como denunciar:*
-   **Telefone:** Ligue para *1746* (dentro do Rio de Janeiro) ou *(21) 3460-1746* (de outras localidades).
-   **Online:** Acesse o site oficial *www.1746.rio*.
-   **WhatsApp:** Envie uma mensagem para *(21) 3460-1746*.
-   **Aplicativo:** Baixe o app *1746* (disponível para Android e iOS).

*Ao registrar a denúncia, informe os seguintes detalhes:*
-   *Endereço completo* (rua, bairro e número) da barraca.
-   *Tipo de atividade* (comida) e *dias/horários* da ocupação.
-   Qual área pública está sendo ocupada (ex: calçada).

Sua denúncia ajudará a fiscalização da Prefeitura a atuar.

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** August 11, 2025

**Research Topic:** Denunciar barraca de comida em calçada no Rio de Janeiro (Reporting a food stall on a sidewalk in Rio de Janeiro)

To report a food stall occupying a sidewalk in Rio de Janeiro, citizens can utilize the municipal services available through the city's official channels. The primary platform for such complaints is the Central de Atendimento 1746. [1] This service can be accessed via telephone by dialing 1746 within the municipality of Rio de Janeiro, or by calling (21) 3460-1746 from other locations. [1] Additionally, the 1746 service is available through its official website (www.1746.rio), a dedicated mobile application for Android and iOS, and via WhatsApp at (21) 3460-1746. [1]

When filing a complaint regarding sidewalk occupation by commercial activities, such as food stalls, it is important to provide specific details. These include the type of establishment and its economic activity, the complete address (street, neighborhood, and number), the days and times of the occupation, and the specific public area being occupied (e.g., sidewalk, square). [1] The Coordenadoria de Controle Urbano (CCU) of the Secretaria Municipal de Fazenda is responsible for carrying out inspections related to street vending and sidewalk occupation. [1]

The process of fiscalization involves notifying and issuing fines for irregular occupations. [1] However, the seizure of goods or equipment depends on the conclusion of the inspection process and may require the support of other municipal bodies. [1] While the CCU conducts these inspections, it is noted that the fiscalization cannot guarantee the immediate or 24-hour-a-day desocupation of sidewalks. [1] For issues related to noise disturbances, a separate subtype, "Perturbação do sossego," should be used.

It [1] is important to distinguish between different types of sidewalk occupations. For instance, if the occupation is by a trailer, kiosk, or street vendor's stall, the subtype "Fiscalização de comércio ambulante" should be selected. The Coordenadoria [1] de Controle Urbano (CCU) is responsible for active inspection of street vending in public areas, including those with stalls, carts, trailers, vans, and kiosks. The expected [1] timeframe for addressing such complaints is generally within 30 calendar days.

For [1] specific regulations concerning the use of sidewalks by commercial establishments, such as the placement of tables and chairs, Lei nº 4.670 of October 2, 2007, establishes standards, including requirements for removable furniture and maintaining free pedestrian circulation. More recent [1] decrees, like Decreto Rio nº 47.550 of June 26, 2020, have also addressed conditions for outdoor seating during specific periods, emphasizing the need for a minimum free pedestrian circulation width.

In cases [2] where the occupation is by a fixed obstacle rather than a commercial activity, such as planters or concrete structures, the service "Fiscalização de obstáculo fixo na calçada" through Portal Rio 1746 should be used. If the issue [1] involves a commercial establishment with an extension onto the sidewalk, including tables and chairs, the service "Fiscalização da ocupação de área pública" is applicable.

The municipal government [1] aims to regulate and organize public spaces, with the Coordenadoria de Controle Urbano playing a key role in overseeing street vending and sidewalk occupations. The goal is to ensure [1] orderly and legal use of public spaces, which benefits the city by fostering urban life and potentially increasing street safety through natural surveillance. [3]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [1746.rio](https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/14208565911963-Fiscaliza%C3%A7%C3%A3o-da-ocupa%C3%A7%C3%A3o-de-%C3%A1rea-p%C3%BAblica)

 - [3] [saude.rj.gov.br](https://www.saude.rj.gov.br/vigilancia-sanitaria/denuncia)

task_data.prompt: a oficina aqui da frente vive botando os carros na calçada, a gente tem que andar no meio da rua. isso pode? como eu reclamo?
task_data.golden_answer:
Estacionar veículo sobre a calçada é proibido pelo Código de Trânsito Brasileiro (art. 181, VIII) e sujeita o infrator a multa e possível remoção pela Guarda Municipal.
 
 Para denunciar:
 
 * Acesse o serviço *Fiscalização de estacionamento irregular de veículo* no Portal 1746: https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10220543556763-Fiscaliza%C3%A7%C3%A3o-de-estacionamento-irregular-de-ve%C3%ADculo
 * Informe endereço completo, ponto de referência e, se possível, placa e modelo do carro.
 * Após a abertura da solicitação, uma equipe da Prefeitura avalia o local; o prazo médio de atendimento é de até 2 h.

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Não, *não pode* botar carros na calçada. Isso configura *ocupação irregular de área pública* e atrapalha a passagem de pedestres.

Você pode reclamar na *Central 1746* da Prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro.

*Como reclamar:*
1.  **Ligue 1746**: Telefone para o número *1746*.
2.  **Pelo site**: Acesse o serviço "Fiscalização da ocupação de área pública" no portal 1746.rio: https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/14208565911963-Fiscaliza%C3%A7%C3%A3o-da-ocupa%C3%A7%C3%A3o-de-%C3%A1rea-p%C3%BAblica.

*Ao registrar a reclamação, informe:*
- O tipo de estabelecimento (oficina).
- Endereço completo (rua, número, bairro).
- Dias e horários em que os carros ficam na calçada.
- O nome da oficina, se souber.

Sua denúncia pode ser feita de forma *totalmente anônima*.

task_data.prompt: meu vizinho cercou um pedaço da praça e fez um jardim pra ele. ele pode fazer isso? é area publica.
task_data.golden_answer:
Praças são bens públicos de uso comum; ninguém pode cercar ou reservar parte delas para uso privado sem autorização formal da Prefeitura. Essa apropriação é considerada *ocupação irregular* e está sujeita a notificação, multa e remoção pela Secretaria Municipal de Ordem Pública (Seop).
 
 * **Como agir**: abra um chamado *Fiscalização da ocupação de área pública* no 1746, indicando endereço, descrição e (se possível) fotos do local.
 * Link direto para o serviço: https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/14208565911963-Fiscaliza%C3%A7%C3%A3o-da-ocupa%C3%A7%C3%A3o-de-%C3%A1rea-p%C3%BAblica
 
 A Prefeitura enviará fiscais, notificará o responsável e poderá remover a cerca e restaurar o uso público da área.

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Seu vizinho *não pode* cercar um pedaço da praça para fazer um jardim particular, pois é uma *área pública*. Essa é considerada uma *ocupação irregular*.

Você pode denunciar essa situação à Prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro através da *Central 1746*:

*   *Telefone:* Ligue para *1746*.
*   *WhatsApp:* Envie mensagem para *(21) 98909-1746*.
*   *Online:* Acesse o portal *1746.rio* (busque por "Fiscalização da ocupação de área pública").

Ao registrar a denúncia, forneça o máximo de detalhes possível:
- *Endereço completo* da praça e do local da ocupação.
- Descrição da irregularidade (ex: *cercamento, tipo de jardim, etc.*).

Sua denúncia pode ser feita de forma *anônima*.

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** August 11, 2025

**Research Topic:** Permitted construction noise hours in Rio de Janeiro

In Rio de Janeiro, the regulation of construction noise and working hours is primarily guided by municipal laws and decrees aimed at controlling noise pollution and ensuring public peace. While there isn't a single, overarching municipal law that dictates a universal start or end time for all construction activities, specific regulations apply to the use of certain equipment and types of work.

For the operation of heavy equipment such as pile drivers and jackhammers, the permitted hours are between 10:00 AM and 5:00 PM on weekdays [1]. The city's approach to noise pollution is based on Municipal Law No. 3.268 of August 29, 2001, amended by Law No. 3.342 of December 28, 2001, and further detailed by Decree No. 29.881 of September 18, 2008, which includes Regulation No. 2 concerning Protection Against Noise [1]. This framework categorizes permissible noise levels based on the time of day and the specific zoning of the area. Generally, daytime is considered from 7:00 AM to 10:00 PM, during which noise levels are more permissive, while nighttime, from 10:00 PM to 7:00 AM, has more restrictive limits [1]. On Sundays and holidays, the daytime period extends from 8:00 AM to 10:00 PM [1].

Specific regulations also exist for the use of explosives in construction. For general civil works involving explosives, the permitted hours are between 10:00 AM and 3:00 PM on weekdays [1]. Similarly, for activities like pile driving that cannot be enclosed, the hours are set between 10:00 AM and 5:00 PM on weekdays, provided that adequate noise control measures are implemented at the source or along the path of the sound [1].

The "Lei do Silêncio" (Silence Law), while often associated with entertainment venues, also extends its purview to other noise sources, including construction, to safeguard public tranquility and well-being. [2] Non-compliance with these noise regulations can result in penalties such as fines, which can range from R$ 500 to R$ 5000, and potentially lead to the embargo of construction projects. [1]

For public works, some activities may be scheduled during nighttime hours to minimize disruption to traffic flow. [1] Citizens experiencing excessive construction noise can report such issues through the 1746 platform or the official website of the Rio de Janeiro City Hall. [3]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [1746.rio](https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10835009527707-Informa%C3%A7%C3%B5es-sobre-os-hor%C3%A1rios-permitidos-para-execu%C3%A7%C3%A3o-de-obras)

 - [3] [youtube.com](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=lacWm1fya-A)

# Research Artifact: Free Legal Assistance from Universities in Rio de Janeiro

As of August 11, 2025, several universities in Rio de Janeiro offer free legal assistance services to the community through their respective Núcleos de Prática Jurídica (NPJ) or similar centers. These services are typically provided by law students under the supervision of qualified professors and cover various areas of law.

**Institutions Offering Free Legal Assistance:**

*   **Faculdade Presbiteriana Mackenzie Rio:** Located in Botafogo, this institution provides free legal guidance through its Núcleo de Práticas Jurídicas (NPJ). The services are available to individuals with financial difficulties or those who are unemployed. The areas covered include Civil, Labor, Criminal, and Family law. Assistance is rendered by law professors, who are all practicing lawyers, and students from the 7th to 10th periods of the Law course. Residents of Botafogo and other areas of Rio de Janeiro can seek assistance. To schedule an appointment, individuals can call (21) 2114-5266 and must bring their RG and relevant documents pertaining to their case. The service [1] is conducted by professors and students, aiming to provide practical legal experience for the students and accessible legal support for the community.

*   [1] **PUC-Rio:** The Núcleo de Prática Jurídica (NPJ) at PUC-Rio offers free legal consultations. As of the current search period, new appointments for the first semester of 2025 were closed, with new slots expected to open in September 2025. Services are provided in person, and attendees are required to present their RG, CPF, and proof of residence. The NPJ can be contacted via phone at (21) 3736-1643/1644 or by email at npj@puc-rio.br.

*   **UNIRIO [2] (Universidade Federal do Estado do Rio de Janeiro):** The Núcleo de Prática Jurídica (NPJur) at UNIRIO offers free legal assistance to underprivileged populations. This service extends to cases handled in the central Rio de Janeiro courts, including Special Courts and Federal and Labor Justice. The assistance is provided by supervising lawyers and professors, along with scholarship students.

*   **UFRJ [3] (Universidade Federal do Rio de Janeiro) - Faculdade Nacional de Direito:** The Núcleo de Prática Jurídica (NPJ) at UFRJ's National Faculty of Law provides legal assistance to the community in Civil, Criminal, and Labor law. Appointments are scheduled in advance following a triage process conducted by the Social Service. For inquiries or to schedule an appointment, individuals can contact luisfigueiredo@direito.ufrj.br or call (21) 3938-1011. The NPJ operates from 8:00 AM to 5:00 PM on Mondays, Tuesdays, and Thursdays.

*   **Universidade [4] Castelo Branco:** The university's Núcleo de Práticas Jurídicas (NPJ) offers preventive legal consultations in Penal, Civil, Family, and Labor law to the community. These services simulate a law firm environment, with students supervised by professors. The NPJ is located at Av. de Santa Cruz, 1631 – Realengo, Rio de Janeiro – RJ. Specific consultation hours are: Wednesdays from 3 PM to 6 PM for Penal Law, and Thursdays from 1 PM to 3 PM for Civil Law, and 3 PM to 6 PM for Labor Law.

*   **UVA (Universidade [2] Veiga de Almeida):** UVA's Núcleos de Prática Jurídica (NPJs) provide legal consultations in Penal, Civil, Labor, and Family law. The university prioritizes assisting residents in the areas where its campuses are located. For information or assistance in Rio de Janeiro, UVA can be reached at (21) 2574 8888 or via WhatsApp at (21) 3924 6060.

*   **UERJ (Universidade [3] do Estado do Rio de Janeiro) - Faculdade de Direito:** The Escritório Modelo, functioning as a Núcleo de Prática Jurídica, serves the underprivileged population, specifically those with incomes not exceeding five minimum wages or who can demonstrate financial hardship. The services cover Civil, Criminal, and Labor law. Due to financial challenges, UERJ's Faculty of Law has adapted its services into specialized "Clínicas" focusing on specific legal themes.

*   **CAJUFF (Centro de Assistência [1] Jurídica) - Departamento de Direito Aplicado (Niterói):** Located in Niterói, CAJUFF offers free legal assistance to individuals who cannot afford legal representation or court costs. The services cover Civil, Family, Consumer, Labor, Criminal, and Social Security law. Assistance is provided by law students under the supervision of specialized professors. Appointments are made through a form, and the service has a waiting list, with new openings expected in the following academic semester.

*   **FGV Direito Rio:** The Núcleo [1] de Prática Jurídica (NPJ) at FGV Direito Rio manages various legal practice programs, including Legal Clinics and Workshops, aimed at enhancing students' practical legal skills and professional development. [1]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [mackenzie.br](https://www.mackenzie.br/es/release/arquivo/n/a/i/faculdade-mackenzie-rio-realiza-atendimento-juridico-gratuito-em-botafogo)

task_data.prompt: quero me divorciar mas não tenho dinheiro pra advogado. como eu marco um atendimento na defensoria publica?
task_data.golden_answer:
Para se divorciar sem custo com advogado, agende atendimento na *Defensoria Pública do Estado do Rio de Janeiro* assim:
 
 * *App Defensoria RJ*: baixe (Android/iOS), cadastre-se e escolha “Família/Divórcio” para marcar atendimento remoto ou presencial.
 * *Telefone 129* (gratuito) – dias úteis, 11 h-18 h; peça ao atendente um horário no núcleo mais próximo.
 * *Portal de Autoatendimento*: preencha o formulário em https://defensoria.rj.def.br/AutoAtendimento/Divorcio e anexe os documentos exigidos.
 
 Documentos básicos: certidão de casamento atualizada (até 6 meses), RG, CPF e comprovantes de renda e endereço.
 
 Mais informações gerais: https://www.defensoria.rj.def.br/Cidadao/Atendimento-On-line

2.  *Aplicativo:* Baixe o app "Defensoria RJ" no seu celular. Por lá, você pode agendar atendimentos remotos ou presenciais e enviar documentos.

*Elegibilidade:*
A Defensoria atende pessoas com renda familiar de até *3 salários mínimos*.

*Documentos necessários (original):*
- *Certidão de casamento* (atualizada, últimos 6 meses).
- *RG e CPF*.
- *Comprovante de renda*.

- Documentos de bens (se houver).

Para mais informações, ligue para *129*.

tool_return.text:
## Research Artifact: Scheduling a Divorce Appointment with the Public Defender's Office in Rio de Janeiro

The Public Defender's Office (Defensoria Pública) in Rio de Janeiro offers several channels for citizens to schedule appointments, including for divorce proceedings. The primary methods involve online services, a dedicated mobile application, and in-person attendance.

### Scheduling Channels and Procedures

For non-urgent matters, including scheduling appointments and inquiring about ongoing processes, online assistance is available on weekdays between 10:00 AM and 5:00 PM. [1]

Urgent cases, such as those involving a risk to life, child apprehension, burial permits, domestic violence, or immediate arrest, require contacting the Judiciary Plantão. This can be done via phone at 129 or through the "Defensoria RJ" mobile application during weekdays from 11:00 AM to 6:00 PM. After 6:00 PM, urgent cases can still be addressed through the "Defensoria RJ" app or by emailing dpplantao@defensoria.rj.def.br.
 [1]
The "Defensoria RJ" mobile application serves as a comprehensive tool for accessing the institution's services. Users can schedule both remote and in-person appointments, submit necessary documentation, track existing appointments, and communicate directly with the Defensoria. To [2] utilize the app, individuals must register using their CPF, full name, email address, and create a password. The [2] app guides users through the process of selecting the reason for their appointment, answering relevant questions, choosing a service location (municipality and neighborhood), reviewing required documentation, and confirming the appointment.
 [3]
For those who prefer in-person service, the process begins by providing your CPF. The [1] general operating hours for in-person attendance are weekdays from 7:00 AM to 12:00 PM, excluding holidays. It [1] is important to note that the Defensoria Pública announced that public attendance scheduling would resume on January 7, 2025, following the judicial recess.

 [1]### Divorce Proceedings: Required Documents and Location

To initiate a divorce case with the Defensoria Pública, applicants must present several documents, typically in their original format. These [4] include:
*   An updated marriage certificate, issued within the last six months.
*  [4]  A valid RG (identity card) or professional identification card.
*  [4]  CPF (Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas).
*   [4] A copy of the most recent income tax return, which is mandatory to demonstrate low-income status and eligibility for free legal aid.
*   [4] Proof of income, such as a payslip, professional ID, or a declaration signed by an employer or professional union, to verify the right to free justice.
*   [4] Proof of residence in the applicant's name, which can include utility bills issued within the last three months, correspondence from private companies or public bodies dated within three months, a declaration from a residents' association dated within three months, a current rental agreement, or a declaration accompanied by an ID and one of the aforementioned documents.
*   [4] Birth certificates of any children, or previous marriage certificates if applicable.
*   [4] If there are assets to be divided, documentation pertaining to these assets (movable or immovable) and their estimated market value is required.

The [4] Defensoria Pública will also request any other documents deemed necessary by the Public Defender during the course of the consultation, and may require document authentication. Divorce [4] services are typically provided at the Family Nucleus corresponding to the user's residence.

### [4] Eligibility for Services

The Defensoria Pública generally serves individuals whose family income does not exceed three times the minimum wage. However, victims of domestic violence are eligible for assistance regardless of their income level.

The administrative [3] headquarters of the Defensoria Pública do Rio de Janeiro are located at Avenida Marechal Câmara, 314 - Centro, RJ. For citizen assistance, the contact number is 129. [4]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [ac.def.br](https://agendamento.ac.def.br/)
 - [2] [youtube.com](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=FIV-Uky6Hac)

task_data.prompt: comprei uma tv que veio quebrada e a loja nao quer trocar. como eu faço uma reclamação no procon?
task_data.golden_answer:
Para reclamar ao Procon Carioca:
 
 1. Formulário online: https://proconcarioca.prefeitura.rio/atendimento-online-do-procon-carioca
 2. Portal Carioca Digital (requer cadastro): https://carioca.rio/servicos/atendimento-ao-consumidor-pelo-procon-carioca ou https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10619744062235-Atendimento-sobre-os-direitos-do-consumidor
 3. Presencial: Rua Aristides Lobo 71, 2º andar, Rio Comprido, 10h-17h
 
 *Documentos*: RG, CPF, comprovante de residência e nota/recibo da TV.
 
 A loja tem até 10 dias corridos para responder.

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Para registrar uma reclamação sobre sua TV quebrada e a loja que se recusa a trocar, você pode procurar o PROCON. Existem duas opções principais no Rio de Janeiro:

*1. PROCON RJ (Estadual)*
- *Online:* Acesse o site *proconline.rj.gov.br*. O serviço online funciona de segunda a sexta, das 7h às 22h.
- *Presencial:* Vá à Av. Rio Branco, 25, 4º andar, de segunda a sexta, das 9h às 17h.

*2. PROCON Carioca (Municipal)*
- *Telefone:* Ligue para o *1746* (dentro do Rio) ou *(21) 3460-1746* (outras localidades).
- *Online:* Acesse o *Portal 1746* e preencha o formulário de reclamação.

*Documentos necessários para a reclamação:*
- *Seu RG e CPF*.
- *Comprovante de residência*.
- *Nome e endereço da loja*.
- *Nota fiscal ou comprovante de compra* da TV.
- Uma *descrição detalhada* do ocorrido.

Após registrar a reclamação, você receberá um número de protocolo para acompanhar o processo.

Gostaria de ajuda para encontrar o site ou o número do *1746*?

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact: Filing a Complaint with PROCON RJ for a Broken TV**

**Date of Search:** August 11, 2025

Consumers in Rio de Janeiro seeking to file a complaint regarding a broken TV or other product issues can utilize the services of PROCON RJ (State Consumer Protection and Defense Program) and PROCON Carioca (Municipal Consumer Protection and Defense Institute) [1].

**Methods for Filing a Complaint:**

1.  **PROCON RJ Online:**
    *   Complaints can be registered through the PROCON Online system, accessible via the website `proconline.rj.gov.br` [2].
    *   The online service is available on weekdays from 7 AM to 10 PM [3].
    *   While the online platform is designed for computer use, it is recommended to download the PROCON-RJ application for filing complaints via mobile devices [1].
    *   After filing, consumers can track the progress of their complaint using a provided protocol number [1]. The online demands are processed on business days between 9 AM and 6 PM, in the order they are received [1].

2.  **PROCON Carioca:**
    *   For issues within the municipality of Rio de Janeiro, PROCON Carioca can be contacted.
    *   Complaints can be initiated by calling 1746 (within Rio de Janeiro) or (21) 3460-1746 (from other locations) [3]. Alternatively, complaints can be opened directly through the 1746 portal by filling out a form [4].
    *   Upon receiving a complaint, PROCON Carioca analyzes the issue, registers it in the national consumer system (Proconsumidor), and notifies the company involved to seek an amicable resolution within 10 calendar days [4].

3.  **Ouvidoria (PROCON RJ):**
    *   The Ouvidoria serves as a channel for consumers to submit complaints, suggestions, denunciations, or compliments regarding PROCON-RJ services.
    *   Contact can be made via email at `ouvidoriaproconrj@gmail.com` or by phone at (21) 2216-8686 [1].

4.  **In-Person Service (PROCON RJ):**
    *   For in-person assistance, consumers can visit PROCON RJ at Av. Rio Branco, 25, 4th floor.
    *   The office is open from Monday to Friday, between 9 AM and 5 PM [1].
    *   It is noted that for certain requests, such as obtaining a payment slip, a prior appointment is required [1].

**Required Information and Documentation:**

To file a complaint, consumers typically need to provide the following:
*   The name and address of the company against which the complaint is being made [3].
*   Personal identification, including ID number and CPF (Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas). [3]
*   Proof of residence. [3]
*   Proof of purchase or service contract, such as an invoice, receipt, or boleto, along with a detailed description of the facts related to the complaint. [3]

**Important Considerations:**

*   PROCON RJ does not handle requests related to moral damages. [1]
*   The process of filing a complaint with PROCON is generally free of charge. [2]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [procononline.rj.gov.br](http://www.procononline.rj.gov.br/)
 - [2] [youtube.com](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=xi0_ANoHxbo)
 - [3] [www.rj.gov.br](https://www.rj.gov.br/servico/reclamar-no-procon-online3)
 - [4] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/atendimento-ao-consumidor-pelo-procon-carioca/)

task_data.prompt: sujaram meu nome por uma divida que eu nao fiz. quero entrar nas pequenas causas. como eu faço? preciso de advogado?
task_data.golden_answer:
Para limpar seu nome, acione o *Juizado Especial Cível (JEC)* do TJ-RJ.
 
 * Documentos: RG, CPF, comp. residência, prova da negativação e contato da empresa.
 * Vá ao balcão de *Primeiro Atendimento* no JEC mais próximo; o servidor redige o pedido e já marca a audiência.
 
 *Limites*: até 40 salários-mínimos. Até 20 SM dispensa advogado; acima disso é obrigatório (Defensoria pode ajudar).
 
 Custas só se faltar à audiência ou se recorrer.
 
 Guia oficial: https://www.tjrj.jus.br/primeiro-atendimento

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Para resolver uma dívida indevida, você pode procurar o *Juizado Especial Cível (JEC)*, conhecido como "Pequenas Causas".

*Precisa de advogado?*
- Se o valor da causa for de até *20 salários mínimos*, você *não precisa* de advogado.
- Se o valor for *acima de 20 salários mínimos*, a presença de um advogado é *obrigatória*.
- Você pode buscar a Defensoria Pública para assistência jurídica gratuita, se tiver direito.

*Como funciona:*
1.  **Junte documentos:** Tenha em mãos todas as provas de que a dívida é indevida (extratos, protocolos de contato, e-mails, etc.).
2.  **Dê entrada no processo:** Você pode iniciar o processo no próprio JEC.
3.  **Audiência de conciliação:** Será agendada uma tentativa de acordo entre as partes.
4.  **Julgamento:** Se não houver acordo, o juiz analisará o caso e dará uma decisão.

É fundamental comparecer a todas as audiências.

**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** Monday, August 11, 2025

**Research Topic:** How to file a small claims case in Rio de Janeiro for an undue debt, and whether a lawyer is required.

**Summary of Findings:**

In Rio de Janeiro, individuals seeking to resolve disputes concerning undue debts can utilize the Juizado Especial Cível (JEC), commonly known as the "Juizado de Pequenas Causas" (Small Claims Court). [1] This legal avenue is designed for swift and simplified resolution of less complex civil matters. [1]

**Process for Filing a Claim:**
The process generally involves gathering all relevant documentation and evidence related to the undue debt. [2] This includes any contracts, conversations, or other proof that clearly demonstrates the debt is not owed or is being incorrectly charged. [2] While some procedures may have transitioned to online platforms, it is advisable to verify the current operating procedures with the specific JEC in Rio de Janeiro. [3] The initial step typically involves filing a claim, which can often be done without the need for a lawyer for cases valued up to 20 minimum wages. [1] The court will then schedule a conciliation hearing, which is an opportunity for the parties to reach an amicable agreement. [1] If no agreement is reached, the judge will proceed with the case and issue a decision based on the presented evidence. [1]

**Requirement for Legal Representation:**
For cases with a value of up to 20 minimum wages, legal representation by a lawyer is not mandatory in the Juizado Especial Cível. However [1], individuals have the option to be assisted by a lawyer, a public defender, or a court-appointed lawyer (advogado dativo) who can provide free legal assistance. For [1] claims exceeding 20 minimum wages, the presence of a lawyer becomes mandatory. Even [1] when not legally required, engaging a lawyer specializing in small claims can enhance the chances of a successful outcome due to their specific knowledge of the procedures and ability to expedite the process.
 [3]
**Types of Cases Handled:**
The Juizado Especial Cível is equipped to handle various everyday issues, including disputes related to consumer rights, problems with banks, telecommunication companies, and cases of undue debt or incorrect charges. For [1] instance, if a person is being charged for a debt they did not incur, the JEC can be approached to cancel the charge and potentially seek compensation for damages.

 [1]**Key Legal Framework:**
The Juizados Especiais Cíveis in Rio de Janeiro operate under Law Federal nº. 9.099/95 and State Law nº. 2556/96. These [1] laws establish the framework for simplified, informal, and expedited legal proceedings. The general [1] principle is to prioritize conciliation and transaction between parties.

**Important [1] Considerations:**
*   **Documentation:** Thorough documentation is crucial for proving your case.
*    [2]**Attendance:** It is vital to attend all scheduled hearings; failure to do so can lead to the dismissal of the case.
*    [2]**Value Limit:** The competence of the JEC is generally limited to cases with a value not exceeding 40 times the minimum wage, though for representation without a lawyer, the limit is 20 minimum wages.
*    [1]**Exclusions:** Certain types of cases, such as those involving family law, inheritance, or complex matters, are not handled by the Juizado de Pequenas Causas. [1]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [advogadodireitodoconsumidor.com](https://www.advogadodireitodoconsumidor.com/)
 - [2] [youtube.com](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=gYuGl5HdT0Q)
 - [3] [youtube.com](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ucdPQTEYTto)

task_data.golden_answer:
Para pedir rede de esgoto:
 
 * Zona Oeste (AP5): Zona Oeste Mais Saneamento 0800 025 0005 | WhatsApp 21 99519-0005
 * Outros bairros: Águas do Rio 0800 195 0195 (AP1-AP3) ou Iguá 0800 721 0784 (AP4)
 
 Solicite *extensão/implantação*, informe endereço completo e guarde protocolo.
 
 Se não atenderem:
 
 * AP5: registre no 1746 (serviço “Fiscalização esgoto Zona Oeste”)
 * Demais áreas: Agenersa 0800 024 9040 | WhatsApp 21 97645-7491
 
 Detalhes:
 https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10271751367323

1.  *Portal Carioca Digital*: Acesse o site para fazer a solicitação online.
2.  *Central 1746*: Você pode ligar para o número 1746, usar o site 1746.rio ou o aplicativo.

A responsabilidade pela instalação da rede de esgoto é de concessionárias como *Águas do Rio* ou *Zona Oeste Mais Saneamento*, dependendo da sua localização. Ao fazer a solicitação, tenha em mãos informações sobre o endereço e, se possível, detalhes sobre a situação atual.

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact: Requesting Sewage Network Installation in Rio de Janeiro**

To request the installation of a sewage network in Rio de Janeiro, citizens should primarily utilize the official channels provided by the municipal government. The **Portal Carioca Digital** and the **1746.rio** service are the main platforms for submitting such requests [1].

The specific entity responsible for sanitation services, including sewage network installation, depends on the location within Rio de Janeiro. **Águas do Rio** is a major concessionaire responsible for sanitation in numerous neighborhoods across the city and surrounding areas. [2] For the West Zone of Rio de Janeiro, particularly within Area of Planning 5 (AP5), **Zona Oeste Mais Saneamento** is the designated concessionaire. [3]

The general process for requesting a sewage network installation typically involves:

1.  **Submitting a Formal Request:** This is usually done online through the **Portal Carioca Digital** or via the **1746.rio** platform (which includes a website, app, and phone service). [4] For specific types of connections, such as the "ligação de efluentes sanitários," the request is formalized through an electronic application on the Portal Carioca Digital.

2 [4].  **Preparing Necessary Documentation:** A comprehensive set of documents is generally required, which may include:
    *   Proof of property ownership, such as the IPTU (Imposto Predial e Territorial Urbano) or property registration documents.
   [3]  *   Identification of the property owner, including RG (Registro Geral) and CPF (Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas) for individuals, or CNPJ (Cadastro Nacional da Pessoa Jurídica) and the company's Social Contract for legal entities.
     [3]*   If a representative is submitting the request, a power of attorney (procuração) is necessary.
    *  [1]  Technical documentation prepared by a qualified professional, such as their CREA (Conselho Regional de Engenharia e Agronomia) card, proof of payment for the current year, and the ART (Anotação de Responsabilidade Técnica) for the project.
    *   Project [3] plans for the sewage system, detailing the collection network and the building connection. These plans must adhere to Brazilian technical standards (ABNT norms, e.g., NBR 7362, 12.208, 12.209) and specific municipal guidelines, such as DZ 215 R4.
    *   A [3] **Ficha Descritiva do Empreendimento (DPE)** might be required, filled out by a professional, to estimate the sewage flow generated by the development.

For residents [3] in the West Zone (AP5), the process may involve obtaining a **Declaração de Possibilidade de Esgotamento Sanitário – DPE** and consulting with **Rio-Águas**.

While **CEDAE  [2](Companhia Estadual de Águas e Esgotos)** is a state-owned company involved in water and sewage services, current operations in many areas are managed by newer concessionaires like Águas do Rio.

Citizens are advised [1] to first identify the correct concessionaire for their specific address and then follow the procedures outlined on the official municipal platforms to initiate the request for sewage network installation. The 1746.rio service can be used to track the progress of submitted requests. [4]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/solicitacao-para-ligacao-de-aguas-pluviais-na-rede-publica/)
 - [2] [rio.rj.gov.br](http://www.rio.rj.gov.br/dlstatic/10112/1377338/DLFE-214223.pdf/2.InstrucaoTecnicoAdministrativa.pdf)
 - [3] [rio.rj.gov.br](http://www.rio.rj.gov.br/dlstatic/10112/1377338/DLFE-214224.pdf/1.0)
 - [4] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/solicitacao-para-ligacao-de-efluentes-sanitarios-apos-tratamento-e-aprovacao-pela-concessionaria-de-esgotamento-sanitario-local-em-sistema-unitario/)

task_data.prompt: meu vizinho jogou o cano de esgoto da casa dele no bueiro da rua. tá um cheiro horrivel. como eu denuncio isso?
task_data.golden_answer:
Para denunciar despejo de esgoto no bueiro:
 
 https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10822324804891-Polui%C3%A7%C3%A3o-h%C3%ADdrica-ou-da-%C3%A1gua
 
 * Clique em *Solicitar* (pode ser anônimo);
 * Informe endereço, descreva que o cano de esgoto da casa do vizinho está ligado ao bueiro e relate o mau cheiro;
 * Anexe fotos, se possível.
 
 Prazo: até 72 h.
 
 Se o imóvel ficar na AP5 (Bangu, Campo Grande, Santa Cruz, etc.), use:
 https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10271876769691-Fiscaliza%C3%A7%C3%A3o-dos-servi%C3%A7os-de-esgoto-da-Zona-Oeste-Mais-Saneamento

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Você pode denunciar essa situação à Prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro através do serviço *1746*. É fundamental que ligações de esgoto não sejam direcionadas para a rede de águas pluviais.

Você tem as seguintes opções para registrar a denúncia:

1.  *Telefone:* Ligue para o número *1746* (dentro do Rio de Janeiro) ou *(21) 3460-1746* (de outras localidades).
2.  *Online:* Acesse o site *www.1746.rio*.
3.  *Aplicativo:* Baixe o *aplicativo 1746 Rio*, disponível para Android e iOS.

Ao registrar a denúncia, forneça o máximo de detalhes possível:
- *Endereço completo* da ocorrência, com ponto de referência.
- Detalhes sobre o *descarte de esgoto* na rede de águas pluviais.
- Se possível, informe se a situação é contínua e em quais horários.

A denúncia será categorizada como "Fiscalização de Poluição Hídrica".

tool_return.text:
## Research Artifact: Reporting Irregular Sewage in Rio de Janeiro to the Prefecture

**Date of Search:** August 11, 2025

To report irregular sewage in Rio de Janeiro to the prefecture, citizens can utilize several official channels, primarily through the **1746** service, which acts as the central point of contact for municipal services [1].

**Primary Reporting Channels:**

*   **Telephone:** Dial **1746** within the municipality of Rio de Janeiro. For calls from other locations, the number is **(21) 3460-1746** [1].
*   **Online Portal:** Access the **www.1746.rio** website [2].
*   **Mobile Application:** Download the **1746 Rio** application, available for Android and iOS devices [2].

**Specific Service for Water Pollution:**
The service for "Fiscalização de Poluição Hídrica" (Water Pollution Inspection) is the relevant category for reporting irregular sewage. This service can be accessed through the aforementioned 1746 channels.

**Information [3] Required for Reporting:**
When making a report, providing comprehensive details is crucial for effective action. Essential information includes:

*   The full name and contact telephone number of the reporter.
*   [3] The complete address of the occurrence, including a clear point of reference.
*   [3] Details on whether the sewage discharge or leak is occurring in a residential or commercial area.
*   [3] If the issue is within a residential building, specify if it has a Sewage Treatment Plant (ETE) and if the sewage is being discharged into rivers, beaches, or rainwater drains.
*   [3] Information on whether there is a leak or pooling of sewage in public streets.
*   [3] Indication of any damaged or burst pipes.
*   [3] A statement on whether the situation is ongoing at the time of reporting, or if not, the specific days and times the issue occurs.

**Concessionary [3] Responsibilities:**
The city's sanitation services are managed by various concessionaries. For issues in the Zona Oeste (West Zone) served by "Zona Oeste Mais Saneamento," the initial report may need to be made directly to the concessionary via email at ouvidoria@zonaoestemais.com.br or through their website, with subsequent follow-up via the 1746 service. For [1] other areas, "Águas do Rio" and "Iguá Saneamento" are among the responsible concessionaries, and their contact details can be used for specific complaints.

**Exclusions [4]:**
It is important to note that sewage issues occurring within private residences or on private property are considered private matters and are the responsibility of the property owner, not the prefecture. [1]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/fiscalizacao-de-poluicao-hidrica-poluicao-da-agua/)
 - [2] [rio.rj.gov.br](http://www.rio.rj.gov.br/web/guest/exibeconteudo?id=5430441)
 - [3] [Current time information in Rio de Janeiro, BR.](https://www.google.com/search?q=time+in+Rio+de+Janeiro,+BR)
 - [4] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/fiscalizacao-dos-servicos-de-esgoto-da-zona-oeste-mais-saneamento/)

sources.label: Current time information in Rio de Janeiro, BR.

task_data.prompt: o esgoto ta voltando pelo bueiro aqui na rua, ta uma nojeira só. quem eu chamo pra desentupir?
task_data.golden_answer:
Procure a concessionária do seu bairro:
 
 * AP5 (Zona Oeste): *Zona Oeste Mais Saneamento* – **0800 025 0005**.
 * AP4 (Barra / Recreio / Jacarepaguá): *Iguá* – **0800 721 0784**.
 * Demais áreas: *Águas do Rio* – **0800 195 0195**.
 
 Depois registre no 1746 (serviço “Desentupimento ou reparo de rede de esgoto”):
 https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10271751367323-Informa%C3%A7%C3%B5es-sobre-desentupimento-ou-reparo-de-rede-de-esgoto-em-logradouros-p%C3%BAblicos
 
 *Entupimento dentro do terreno é responsabilidade do morador.*

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Para denunciar esgoto voltando pelo bueiro na rua, você deve entrar em contato com a *Central 1746* da Prefeitura do Rio.

Você pode fazer isso das seguintes formas:
- Pelo telefone: ligue para o *1746*.
- Pelo aplicativo *1746 Rio*.

Ao registrar sua solicitação, informe o endereço completo e, se possível, pontos de referência para facilitar a localização.

Se a sua região for atendida por uma concessionária específica, como *Águas do Rio* (0800 195 0195) ou *Iguá Saneamento SA* (0800 721 0784), você também pode contatá-las diretamente.

To report a sewage leak to the Rio de Janeiro City Hall, citizens can utilize several official channels. The primary method for reporting public service issues, including sewage leaks, is through the **1746** service [1]. The 1746 service also has a mobile application, "1746 Rio," which allows citizens to request various municipal services and track their progress [1].

They can be contacted by phone at 0800 025 0005, via WhatsApp at (21) 99519 0005, or through their website [2].

For other neighborhoods in the city (AP1, AP2, AP3, and AP4), the concessionaires Águas do Rio or Iguá Saneamento SA are responsible. Águas [2] do Rio can be reached at 0800 195 0195, and Iguá Saneamento SA can be contacted at 0800 721 0784.

This includes the full name and contact phone number of the reporter, the complete address of the occurrence with a reference point, and whether the pollution is in a residential or commercial area. It [3] is also helpful to note if the situation is ongoing, and if not, the days and times of occurrence.

It [3] is important to note that sewage leaks or blockages occurring within a residence or on private property are the responsibility of the property owner and are not handled by the City Hall.

For [2] complaints regarding the service provided by the concessionaires, the 1746 service can be used for Zona Oeste Mais Saneamento, while complaints about Águas do Rio and Iguá Saneamento SA can be directed to AGENERSA, the state regulatory body, at 0800 024 9040. [2]

task_data.prompt: bom dia, to precisando marcar uma consulta com o medico aqui na clinica da familia. como eu faço pra agendar?
task_data.golden_answer:
Bom dia! Para marcar sua consulta na Clínica da Família, escolha a forma mais fácil para você:
 
 * *MinhaSaúde.Rio*: baixe o app (Android ou iOS) ou acesse *https://web2.smsrio.org/portalPaciente/*. Faça login com CPF ou CNS e clique em “Agendar consulta”. Funciona se você já estiver cadastrado na Estratégia Saúde da Família.
 * Presencial: vá à recepção da sua Clínica da Família com documento de identidade e comprovante de residência e solicite o agendamento.
 * Não sabe qual é a sua unidade? Consulte o mapa das unidades em *https://pcrj.maps.arcgis.com/apps/webappviewer/index.html?id=014d8ab512a34f259bb27c8a13d4d65f*.
 
 Mais informações: *https://prefeitura.rio/saude/consultas-nas-clinicas-da-familia-podem-ser-marcadas-por-meio-de-um-aplicativo/*
