tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact: Free Vocational Training Courses in Rio de Janeiro**

The Rio de Janeiro City Hall offers various free vocational training and qualification courses through several municipal secretariats and platforms, aiming to enhance residents' employability and skills.

**Key Programs and Platforms:**

*   **Programa Rio + Cursos:** Managed by the Secretaria Municipal de Trabalho e Renda (SMTE), this program provides vocational training and qualification activities. It prioritizes individuals in vulnerable social situations, the unemployed, and those aged 18 and above. Young people aged 14 and older can also participate if they are enrolled in school or have completed their secondary education or EJA (Youth and Adult Education). Information and registration details for these courses are available on the `trabalho.prefeitura.rio/` website and the SMTE's social media channels. In-person registration is available at Central do Trabalhador posts, and online registration can be completed via the SMTE portal and social media. Applicants are required to present identification, CPF, proof of schooling, and proof of residence [1]. The program includes specific initiatives such as "Rio + Cursos Mulher," "Rio + Cursos na Escola," "Rio + Cursos Diversidade," and "Rio + Cursos 60+" tailored to different demographic groups [2].

*   **Plataforma Rio On:** This digital learning platform, a joint initiative of the Secretaria Municipal de Ciência e Tecnologia and Senac RJ, offers free online courses focused on digital literacy and job market readiness. The courses are designed to develop 21st-century skills and have durations ranging from 8 to 60 hours. Eligibility criteria include being a resident of Rio de Janeiro and being at least 16 years old. [3] The platform features a variety of IT-related courses, including Database Development, Introduction to Artificial Intelligence, Webdesign, Excel, Digital Marketing, and Power BI. [3]

*   **Naves do Conhecimento:** These are municipal facilities that provide free courses, workshops, and events centered on technology and entrepreneurship, serving as hubs for digital inclusion within the city. [4]

**Specific Course Offerings:**

*   **Electrician Courses:** The **Escola Light** offers a free three-month (208-hour) electrician training program. This course covers fundamental electrical concepts, NR-10, NR-33, NR-35, and aerial network maneuvers, with practical training conducted at Light facilities. [4] Other search results mentioning electrician courses were either from different municipalities or less official sources. [3]

*   **IT/Informatics Courses:** The **Plataforma Rio On** provides a comprehensive selection of IT courses, including those focused on programming, web design, data analysis (e.g., Power BI, Excel), and digital marketing. [3] Additionally, the **Naves do Conhecimento** offer technology-focused training programs. [4] The **Projeto Geração Crescer**, under the SMTE, offers free distance learning (EAD) courses in technology and job market preparation.

 [3]**Official Information Sources:**

*   Secretaria Municipal de Trabalho e Renda (SMTE): `trabalho.prefeitura.rio/`.
* [1]   Plataforma Rio On: `rioon.rio.br`.
* [3]   Portal Carioca Digital: Provides information on various municipal services and programs.
* [3]   For inquiries regarding municipal services, the public can contact the central service number 1746.

The [1] current date is Monday, August 11, 2025.

**Sources:**
 - [1] [saogoncalo.rj.gov.br](https://www.saogoncalo.rj.gov.br/sao-goncalo-abre-inscricoes-para-cursos-profissionalizantes-gratuitos/)
 - [2] [prefeitura.rio](https://prefeitura.rio/ciencia-e-tecnologia/prefeitura-tem-mais-de-600-vagas-em-cursos-gratuitos-na-plataforma-rio-on/)
 - [3] [clickpetroleoegas.com.br](https://clickpetroleoegas.com.br/curso-de-qualificacao-de-graca-prefeitura-oferece-cursos-com-lanche-e-transporte-para-jovens-e-adultos-veja-onde-sima00/)

task_data.prompt: fiz 60 anos, quero tirar aquele cartao pra estacionar em vaga de idoso. como eu faço?
task_data.golden_answer:
Você pode solicitar o *Cartão de Estacionamento para Idoso* (60+ anos), gratuito e válido por 5 anos, para utilizar nas vagas demarcadas.
 
 1. Acesse o Carioca Digital:
 
  * Site: carioca.rio
  * Menu: Veículo e Estacionamento > Cartão de Estacionamento do Idoso
  * Imprima o cartão em impressora jato de tinta ou laser colorida.
 
 2. Documentos necessários:
 
  * Requerimento preenchido (formulário no site da SMTR: http://www.rio.rj.gov.br/web/smtr)
  * Cópia da identidade com foto e CPF
  * Comprovante de residência em seu nome
 
 3. Opcional: presencialmente nos postos da Secretaria Municipal de Transportes (ex.: Rua do Riachuelo, 257 – Centro).
 
 Link oficial:
 https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/9674606414875-Cart%C3%A3o-de-estacionamento-para-idosos

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Para tirar o cartão de estacionamento para idoso no Rio de Janeiro, que te dá direito a vagas especiais, você tem as seguintes opções:

1.  *Online (recomendado)*:
    Acesse o portal *Carioca Digital* (carioca.rio), vá na seção "Veículo e Estacionamento" e escolha "Cartão de Estacionamento do Idoso". Você pode imprimir o cartão diretamente de lá.

2.  *Presencialmente*:
    Vá a um dos pontos de atendimento da Secretaria Municipal de Transportes (SMTR).

*Documentos necessários*:
- Cópia simples do seu *documento de identidade oficial* (RG ou CNH) com foto, assinatura e CPF.
- Cópia simples de um *comprovante de residência* recente em seu nome.

O cartão tem validade de 5 anos e deve ser visível no painel do carro. Ele pode ser usado em qualquer veículo, desde que o idoso esteja presente.

Para mais informações, você pode acessar o link oficial: https://carioca.rio/servicos/cartao-de-estacionamento-de-idoso/

Você gostaria de saber como acessar o Carioca Digital ou onde encontrar um ponto de atendimento da SMTR?

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact: Credencial de Estacionamento para Idosos no Rio de Janeiro**

**Date of Search:** August 11, 2025

The Credencial de Estacionamento para Idoso in Rio de Janeiro is a permit that allows individuals aged 60 years or older to utilize designated parking spaces for free in public areas [1]. While the card grants access to preferential parking spots in private establishments such as malls, it does not exempt the user from payment in these locations [2]. The permit is valid nationwide [1].

**Eligibility Criteria:**
To be eligible for the Credencial de Estacionamento para Idoso, applicants must be 60 years of age or older [1].

**Application Process:**
The application for the Credencial de Estacionamento para Idoso can be completed through several methods:

1.  **Online via Carioca Digital:** Applicants can access the Carioca Digital portal (carioca.rio) and navigate to the "Veículo e Estacionamento" section, then select "Cartão de Estacionamento do Idoso." It is possible to print the card directly from the website.
2 [1].  **In Person:** Applications can also be submitted at designated service points of the Secretaria Municipal de Transportes (SMTR). Specific addresses for these service points are available.
3 [3].  **By Mail:** The card can be requested by sending a registered letter with acknowledgment of receipt (AR).
 [1]
**Required Documentation:**
The documentation required may vary slightly depending on the application method. Generally, the following are needed:

*   **For Online Applications:** Personal information is typically entered into the system. Specific documents might be required for verification or printing purposes.
 [1]*   **For In-Person or Mail Applications:**
    *   A formal request (Requerimento) addressed to the Coordinator of Regulation and Road Infractions of the SMTR.
 [1]    *   A simple copy of the applicant's official identification document (such as an RG or Carteira Nacional de Habilitação - CNH) that includes a photo, signature, and CPF number.
   [1]  *   A simple copy of a recent proof of residence in the applicant's name.

* [1]*Card Validity and Usage:**
The Credencial de Estacionamento para Idoso has a validity period of five years, after which a new card must be requested. The [1] card must be displayed in a visible location on the vehicle's dashboard. It [3] can be used in any vehicle, provided the elderly person is using it. In [2] public parking areas managed by the "Rio Rotativo" system, the card grants exemption from payment. However [1], in private establishments like shopping malls, the card allows the use of preferential parking spots but does not waive any associated fees. Each [2] CPF can only be used to issue one parking permit for the elderly. The [1] card features a QR Code, which enhances transparency and allows for public verification. If [2] a printed card is smudged, has color discrepancies, or is cut off, it may be considered invalid. Misuse [1], such as lending the card to others, using copies, or presenting a damaged card, can lead to its confiscation by traffic agents.

* [2]*Parking Space Regulations:**
Federal legislation, specifically Law No. 10.741/2003 (Estatuto do Idoso), mandates that at least 5% of public regulated parking spaces must be reserved exclusively for the elderly. Any [3] elderly individual possessing the correct permit can utilize these designated spots.

* [3]*Additional Information:**
For lost, stolen, or damaged cards, a second copy (2ª via) can only be requested in person at SMTR service points. The [1] system for issuing these cards has been re-established and applications are processed in the order they are received. Inquiries [4] and status updates on applications can be made through the 1746 service. [1]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [idoso.com.br](https://idoso.com.br/dicas/cartao-de-estacionamento-para-idoso/)
 - [2] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/cartao-de-estacionamento-de-idoso/)
 - [3] [prefeitura.rio](https://transportes.prefeitura.rio/cartao-de-estacionamento-para-idoso/)
 - [4] [prefeitura.rio](https://prefeitura.rio/transportes/sistema-de-emissao-de-cartoes-de-estacionamento-para-idosos-e-restabelecido/)

task_data.prompt: levei uma multa que eu acho que foi errada. como eu faço pra recorrer? tem algum modelo de carta?
task_data.golden_answer:
Para recorrer de uma multa de trânsito:
 
 * Apresente *Defesa Prévia* à SMTR/CET-Rio até 30 dias úteis do recebimento da notificação.
 * Pelo portal Carioca Digital: acesse https://carioca.rio/servicos/defesa-previa-de-autuacao/ e clique em “ACESSAR O SERVIÇO” (https://processos-radar.serpro.gov.br/).
 * Documentos: formulário de Recurso preenchido e assinado; CNH ou RG; CRLV; comprovante de residência (se for alegar não recebimento da notificação); provas que sustentem sua defesa.
 * Se preferir pelo correio: envie com Aviso de Recebimento para Rua Dom Marcos Barbosa, 2 – Loja 1 – Cidade Nova, Rio de Janeiro - RJ, CEP 20211-178.
 * Baixe o modelo de Requerimento de Recurso em plain text: https://carioca.rio/wp-content/uploads/2020/04/DefesaPreviaCancelamentodeMulta.doc

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Para recorrer de uma multa de trânsito que você considera indevida, a Prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro oferece algumas opções.

*Como recorrer:*
1.  *Pelo Carioca Digital:* Acesse o portal (carioca.rio), procure por "Veículo e Estacionamento" e selecione "Recurso de multas". Você pode enviar a *Defesa Prévia* por lá.
2.  *Por e-mail:* Envie para multas.smtr@gmail.com. No assunto do e-mail, inclua o número da infração.
3.  *Por correio:* Envie com Aviso de Recebimento (AR) para a Secretaria Municipal de Transportes (SMTR), no endereço Rua Dom Marcos Barbosa, 2 - Loja 1 - Cidade Nova – RJ, CEP 20211-178.

*Documentos necessários (geralmente):*
- Requerimento de recurso preenchido.
- Cópia da notificação da autuação ou auto de infração.
- Cópia do CRLV do veículo.
- Cópia da sua CNH ou outro documento de identificação com foto.
- Procuração, se for o caso.
- Comprovante de residência.
- Provas que sustentem seu recurso (fotos, declarações, etc.).

*Sobre o modelo de carta:*
Não há um modelo fixo, mas sua "carta" (recurso) deve conter:
- Seus dados completos (nome, endereço, CPF, CNH).
- Dados do veículo (placa, modelo, RENAVAM).
- Número da multa.
- Suas *alegações* claras e objetivas sobre o motivo do recurso.
- Lista dos documentos anexados.

*Importante:*
- Fique atento aos *prazos* indicados na notificação da multa para apresentar seu recurso.
- O pagamento com 40% de desconto *implica na desistência do recurso*.

Você gostaria de mais detalhes sobre como preencher o requerimento ou quais argumentos podem ser usados?

## Research Artifact: Appealing Traffic Tickets in Rio de Janeiro

**Date of Search:** August 11, 2025

To appeal a traffic ticket issued by the Prefecture of Rio de Janeiro, citizens can utilize several methods, primarily through the Carioca Digital portal, but also via email or postal mail for certain procedures. The process involves submitting a "Defesa Prévia" (Preliminary Defense) or other forms of appeal, depending on the stage of the infraction. [1]

### Methods for Submitting Appeals:

1.  **Carioca Digital Portal:** This is the primary digital channel for submitting appeals, including Defesa Prévia and Real Infrator (indicating the actual driver) for individuals. Users must log in to the portal (carioca.rio), navigate to "Veículo e Estacionamento," select "Recurso de multas," and then choose the specific infraction to file the Defesa Prévia. Documents [2] can be uploaded directly to the portal, with specified file size and format limitations (up to 5MB, in .pdf, .png, .jpg, or .jpeg).
2. [3]  **Email:** Appeals for "Recurso de Notificação da Penalidade (Cancelamento de Multa)" and "Recurso da Notificação de Autuação (Defesa Prévia)" can be submitted via email to multas.smtr@gmail.com. The email subject should include the infraction number, and necessary documents must be attached.
3.  **Postal [1] Mail:** Appeals can also be sent by postal mail with Aviso de Recebimento (AR) to the headquarters of the Secretaria Municipal de Transportes (SMTR) at Rua Dom Marcos Barbosa, 2 - Loja 1 - Cidade Nova – RJ, CEP 20211-178.
4.  **In-Person [3]:** For requests related to the cancellation of fines or restitution of amounts paid, in-person submission at SMTR decentralized posts or the central protocol may be required, often necessitating prior scheduling.

### Required [2] Documentation for Appeals:

The documentation required for an appeal generally includes:

*   A completed application/request form (Requerimento).
*   A copy of [2] the notification of autuação, auto de infração, or a document from SMTR containing the vehicle's plate and infraction number.
*   A copy of the [2] vehicle's Certificate of Registration and Licensing (CRLV).
*   A copy of the [2] applicant's National Driver's License (CNH) or another valid identification document that proves their signature. If the applicant is a legal entity, documentation proving representation is necessary.
*   A power of attorney [2], if applicable.
*   Proof of residence [2], particularly if the appeal is based on the non-receipt of the notification.
*   Any supporting [2] evidence or documents that substantiate the claims made in the appeal.

For specific situations [3], such as suspected vehicle cloning, additional documents like a police report, expert report, and vehicle photographs are required.

### Structure and [3] Content of an Appeal Letter:

While a specific downloadable "model letter" is not directly provided in the search results, the information gathered indicates the essential components and structure for an appeal:

*   **Addressee:** The appeal should be addressed to the Secretary of Municipal Transport.
*   **Applicant [2] Information:** Include full name, address, electronic contact information, neighborhood, postal code, CNH/ID number, CPF/CNPJ number, and phone number.
*   **Type of Request [2]:** Clearly state whether the request is for "Defesa Prévia" or "Cancelamento de Multa".
*   **Arguments  [2](Alegações):** Present the reasons for the appeal clearly and concisely. This section should detail any alleged errors in the infraction notice, such as incorrect vehicle data, inconsistencies in the location or time of the offense, or lack of sufficient evidence to support the infraction. Potential arguments [2] could include "DA AUSÊNCIA DE NOTIFICAÇÃO PRÉVIA" (lack of prior notification) if applicable.
*   **Vehicle Information [4]:** Include details such as the vehicle's make, model, plate number, and RENAVAM.
*   **Legitimacy:** Establish [4] the applicant's standing to file the appeal.
*   **Facts of the Case [4]:** Describe the circumstances of the alleged infraction as presented in the notice.
*   **Attached Documents [4]:** List all documents submitted with the appeal.

It is crucial to adhere [2] to the deadlines indicated on the notification for submitting the appeal. Opting for the 40% discount [3] on the fine implies an admission of guilt and waives the right to appeal. Incomplete or incorrect [3] information in the appeal can negatively impact its evaluation. [2]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [Current time information in Rio de Janeiro, BR.](https://www.google.com/search?q=time+in+Rio+de+Janeiro,+BR)
 - [2] [prefeitura.rio](https://prefeitura.rio/noticias/secretaria-de-transportes-estabelece-novos-procedimentos-para-recurso-de-multas/)
 - [3] [1746.rio](https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10872930337051-Multa-de-tr%C3%A2nsito-informa%C3%A7%C3%B5es-sobre-recurso)

Olá! Para solicitar a remoção de um carro que está bloqueando sua garagem, você deve entrar em contato com a *Central 1746* da Prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro. A *Guarda Municipal* é a responsável por fiscalizar e tomar as medidas cabíveis.

Você pode acionar a Central 1746 das seguintes formas:

-   *Telefone*: Ligue para *1746* ou *(21) 3460-1746*.

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** August 11, 2025

**Research Topic:** Remover carro parado em frente a garagem no Rio de Janeiro

**Summary:**

To address a vehicle parked in front of a garage in Rio de Janeiro, the primary course of action is to report the incident to the municipal authorities. The Guarda Municipal (Municipal Guard) is the responsible body for enforcing traffic regulations and addressing instances of irregular parking, including vehicles obstructing garage entrances [1].

**Reporting Procedure:**

Citizens can report a car parked in front of a garage, on the sidewalk, or in other improper parking spots by contacting the Central 1746 [1]. The 1746 service can be accessed through various channels:
*   **Phone:** Call 1746 or (21) 3460-1746 [1].
*   **WhatsApp:** (21) 3460-1746 [2].
*   **Mobile App:** The 1746 Rio app is available for Android and iOS [1].
*   **Online Portals:** Through the websites 1746.rio and carioca.rio [1].

**Enforcement and Response:**

Upon receiving a report, a Guarda Municipal vehicle is dispatched to the location. The typical response time for the service is within two hours [1]. The Guarda Municipal will issue a traffic infraction notice (multa) and, in some cases, may tow the vehicle [1]. The removal of the vehicle is an administrative measure handled by the Secretaria de Ordem Pública (SEOP). [2]

**Legal Basis and Regulations:**

Parking in front of a garage, specifically where there is a lowered curb intended for vehicle entry or exit, is prohibited by the Brazilian Traffic Code (Código de Trânsito Brasileiro - CTB). This [2] is considered a medium-level infraction, subject to a fine and potential vehicle removal. The [2] CTB also states that parking in locations with a lowered curb designated for vehicle access is an offense.

 [2]**Vehicle Removal:**

If a vehicle is towed, information regarding its location and the procedure for release can be found through the SEOP system by checking the license plate or chassis number on https://jeap.rio.rj.gov.br/je-darm. The [3] costs associated with towing and storage (daily fees) must be paid to release the vehicle. These fees are calculated from the date the vehicle enters the depot, including weekends and holidays. Payment [3] for these fees cannot be scheduled or made via mobile app or internet; it must be done at bank counters, with only Santander and Banco do Brasil accepting payments at the "boca do caixa".

 [3]**Important Considerations:**

*   It is illegal to park in front of a garage, even if it is your own.
* [2]   Citizens are advised to remain calm and act legally when encountering such situations, avoiding any damage to the vehicle.
* [4]   Evidence such as photos or videos of the illegally parked vehicle can be helpful when reporting the incident.
* [1]   The service for fiscalizing irregular parking is one of the most frequently requested via the 1746 app.
* [1]   The removal of abandoned vehicles is a separate service, with specific criteria for what constitutes an abandoned vehicle (e.g., signs of collision, vandalism, decomposition, missing plates). Vehicles [3] in normal condition that are parked irregularly fall under the "Fiscalização de estacionamento irregular" service. [3]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [rio.rj.gov.br](http://www.rio.rj.gov.br/dlstatic/10112/4296177/4107216/ESTACIONAMENTOIRREGULAR.pdf)
 - [2] [1746.rio](https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10220543556763-Fiscaliza%C3%A7%C3%A3o-de-estacionamento-irregular-de-ve%C3%ADculo)
 - [3] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/remocao-de-veiculo-abandonado-em-via-publica/)
 - [4] [doutormultas.com.br](https://doutormultas.com.br/para-onde-ligar-quando-estacionam-na-sua-garagem/)

task_data.prompt: os carros passam voando aqui na rua da escola do meu filho. como eu peço pra colocarem um radar aqui?
task_data.golden_answer:
Para solicitar a instalação de radar (equipamento de fiscalização eletrônica) na rua da escola do seu filho:
 
 1. Formalize o pedido:
 
  * Online: acesse https://carioca.rio/servicos/informacoes-sobre-implantacao-de-equipamento-de-fiscalizacao-eletronica-avanco-de-sinal/ e clique em *Acessar o Serviço* (https://acesso.processo.rio)
  * Presencial: dirija-se à Região Administrativa do seu bairro (endereços em http://www.rio.rj.gov.br/web/cvl/ra) 
 
 2. Faça login com Identidade Carioca ou Gov.Br e preencha:
 
  * Nome da rua, número e ponto de referência (ex.: escola)
  * Nome das ruas do cruzamento (se houver)
  * Para pedidos em frente a colégio ou creche, anexe requerimento em papel timbrado
 
 *Prazo*: até 30 dias após o recebimento do pedido

1.  *Pelo serviço 1746:*

    -   Acesse o *Portal 1746* em www.1746.rio.
2.  *Pelo Portal Carioca Digital:*

tool_return.text:
### Research Artifact: Soliciting Radar or Speed Bump Installation in Rio de Janeiro

The process for requesting the installation of speed bumps (lombadas) or radars in Rio de Janeiro involves formalizing the request through official channels, primarily via the Portal Carioca Digital or the 1746 service. The installation of such traffic calming devices is subject to budget availability and the completion of specific technical studies to assess factors like traffic volume, accident risks, and urban planning considerations [1].

**How to Request Installation:**

*   **Portal Carioca Digital:** The request can be submitted virtually through the Portal Carioca Digital. This typically involves accessing the relevant service, logging in with an "Identidade Carioca" or Gov.Br account, filling out a form, and attaching necessary documents [1]. The Portal Carioca Digital is a platform designed to centralize city services for citizens [1].
*   **Regional Administrations:** Alternatively, requests can be formalized at the relevant Regional Administration office in the neighborhood where the installation is desired [1].
*   **1746 Service:** The 1746 service, which includes a phone line and an application, is the primary channel for citizen requests and information in Rio de Janeiro [2]. Citizens can use the 1746 service to make requests, provide feedback, and obtain information about various municipal services, including traffic-related matters [2].

**Information Required for the Request:**

When submitting a request, the following information is generally needed:
*   Full name of the street and its number [1].
*   A reference point for the location [1].
*   The names of intersecting streets, if applicable [1].
*   For traffic signals located in front of schools, hospitals, or public buildings, the request must be submitted on official letterhead from the respective institution [1].

**Process and Considerations:**

*   **Technical Studies:** The implementation of speed bumps or radars is contingent upon the approval of specific technical studies that evaluate traffic flow, accident history, and urbanistic aspects of the location [1].
*   **Budget and Approval:** The project's realization depends on budgetary availability and the approval of these studies [1].
*   **Response Time:** The expected timeframe for processing the request is up to 30 days after its receipt, although the actual installation depends on the aforementioned studies and approvals [1].
*   **Existing Speed Bumps:** For existing speed bumps that are considered irregular or are in disrepair, a separate process exists for requesting their removal or re-adaptation. This also involves evaluation by the Companhia de Engenharia de Tráfego (CET-Rio) and potentially the Secretaria Municipal de Conservação (Seconserva).

The [3] Companhia de Engenharia de Tráfego do Rio de Janeiro (CET-Rio) is the municipal body responsible for traffic engineering and management, including the installation and maintenance of traffic control devices. The [1] 1746 service is a comprehensive platform for citizen interaction with the Rio de Janeiro municipality, handling a wide range of service requests and information dissemination.

The [2] current date is Monday, August 11, 2025.

**Sources:**
 - [1] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/informacoes-sobre-implantacao-de-equipamento-de-fiscalizacao-eletronica-avanco-de-sinal/)
 - [2] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/grupo/fiscalizacao-eletronica/)
 - [3] [1746.rio](https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10872732006299-Informa%C3%A7%C3%B5es-sobre-implanta%C3%A7%C3%A3o-de-equipamento-de-fiscaliza%C3%A7%C3%A3o-eletr%C3%B4nica-avan%C3%A7o-de-sinal)

task_data.prompt: vou fazer obra em casa e preciso parar um caminhao na rua. tenho que pedir autorização pra fechar a rua por umas horas?
task_data.golden_answer:
*Sim. Para fechar a rua e impedir o trânsito enquanto o caminhão estiver na obra, você precisa solicitar *autorização de fechamento de logradouro público* junto à Subprefeitura de sua região.*
 
 *Documentos Obrigatórios:*
 
 * Abaixo-assinado com, no mínimo, 75% dos proprietários impactados
 * Planta esquemática da instalação (PDF)
 
 *Prazo de resposta:* 60 dias

 Para iniciar o pedido, acesse:

**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** August 11, 2025

**Research Topic:** Authorization to close a street for construction work in Rio de Janeiro.

To obtain authorization for closing a street for construction work in Rio de Janeiro, the process generally involves applying through the relevant municipal bodies. The Portal Rio 1746 and the Carioca Digital portal are key platforms for accessing information and initiating requests related to public works and street usage [1].

**Key Information and Procedures:**

*   **Application Process:** For authorization to close public thoroughfares, the interested party must submit a request directly to the Subprefeitura of their region [1]. The process may also be initiated through the Carioca Digital portal for licensing of planned works or repairs on public roads [2].
*   **Responsible Bodies:** The CET-Rio, in partnership with the Subprefeituras, is involved in evaluating potential traffic impacts and granting authorization for street closures [3]. The Secretaria Municipal de Desenvolvimento Urbano e Licenciamento (SMDU) is responsible for urban planning and licensing within the municipality [4].
*   **Documentation:** While specific documents can vary, general requirements for such authorizations may include an application form, a schematic plan of the installation, and potentially an undersigned petition from a majority of affected property owners [1]. For other types of public works or repairs, documentation such as an ART (Anotação de Responsabilidade Técnica) or RRT (Registro de Responsabilidade Técnica) from the responsible professional may be required.
*  [4]  **Legislation:** The process is governed by legislation such as Decree Rio Nº 43.038 of April 18, 2017, as amended by Decree Nº 52.861 of July 17, 2023. This [1] legislation outlines conditions for street closures, including restrictions on impacting public services, collective transport, and essential facilities.
*    [3]**Authorization Conditions:** Any authorization granted is typically on a precarious basis, meaning it can be revoked by the public administration at any time. Furthermore [3], street closures must not impede public services like road maintenance, tree pruning, or public lighting repairs. There [3] is no possibility of authorization for structures affixed to sidewalks.

For [1] specific details or to initiate a request, it is recommended to consult the official portals of the Prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro or contact the Central 1746. [1]

**Sources:**

task_data.prompt: tem um carro abandonado aqui na rua faz meses, ja ta todo destruido. como eu peço pra prefeitura vir rebocar?
task_data.golden_answer:
Para solicitar a remoção de veículo abandonado:
 
 * Acesse o site da Central 1746: *https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10221186863003-Remoção-de-veículo-abandonado-em-via-pública*
 * Clique em *Enviar uma solicitação* ou escolha *Solicitar anonimamente*.
 * Selecione: Ordem Pública > Veículo > Remoção de veículo abandonado em via pública.
 * Preencha: endereço completo com ponto de referência; descrição do veículo (modelo, placa e estado); tempo de abandono.
 * Envie a solicitação.
 
 Prazo de atendimento: *até 15 dias corridos*.

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Para denunciar um carro abandonado na rua, o canal oficial da Prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro é a *Central 1746*.

*Como denunciar:*
1.  **Telefone:** Ligue para o número *1746*.
2.  **Aplicativo:** Use o aplicativo *1746 Rio*.
3.  **Portal:** Acesse o site oficial *1746.rio*.

*Informações necessárias para a denúncia:*
Ao registrar, forneça o máximo de detalhes para ajudar a fiscalização:
-   *Endereço completo* onde o veículo está.
-   *Características do veículo* (modelo, cor, placa se visível, e condição aparente).
-   *Tempo* que o carro está no local.

*Processo após a denúncia:*
Agentes municipais irão avaliar o veículo. Se for considerado abandonado, será afixada uma notificação para o proprietário remover o carro em até 5 dias úteis. Caso não seja removido, o veículo será rebocado para um depósito municipal. O prazo para a remoção pode ser de até 15 dias corridos.

Você pode encontrar mais informações sobre o serviço de remoção de veículos abandonados no portal carioca.rio: https://carioca.rio/servicos/remocao-de-veiculo-abandonado-em-via-publica/

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** August 11, 2025

**Research Topic:** How to report an abandoned car to the Rio de Janeiro City Hall.

**Synthesis:**

To report an abandoned vehicle in the city of Rio de Janeiro, citizens can utilize the official channels provided by the municipality. The primary method for reporting is through the 1746 Central de Atendimento, which can be accessed via telephone, the 1746 Rio application, or the www.1746.rio portal [1]. The process involves providing specific information to facilitate the removal of the vehicle [1].

**Information Required for Reporting:**
*   The complete address of the vehicle's location, including reference points [1].
*   Characteristics of the abandoned vehicle, such as model, license plate (if visible), and its apparent condition [1].
*   The duration the vehicle has been in the reported location [1].

**Procedure for Vehicle Removal:**
Upon receiving a report, municipal agents will assess the vehicle. If the vehicle meets the criteria for abandonment, a notification will be affixed to its windshield, informing the owner to remove it within a specified period, typically five business days [2]. If the owner fails to remove the vehicle within this timeframe, it will be towed to a municipal depot [2]. The expected timeframe for the removal of an abandoned vehicle is up to 15 calendar days [1].

**Criteria for Identifying Abandoned Vehicles:**
Vehicles are generally considered abandoned if they exhibit signs of neglect, such as:
*   Collision or vandalism damage [3].
*   Evident decomposition of the bodywork and removable parts, including at least two deflated tires [3].
*   Broken windows [3].
*   Missing at least one license plate [3].

The municipality distinguishes between abandoned vehicles and those considered irreparable or scrap. Irreparable vehicles or scrap metal, which lack any mandatory identification plates and have structural damage rendering them unusable due to accidents, weather, or disuse, are handled by COMLURB (Companhia Municipal de Limpeza Urbana) [2]. Vehicles in normal operating condition, even if parked irregularly, should be reported through the "Fiscalização de estacionamento irregular" service.
 [3]
**Legal Basis:**
The removal of abandoned vehicles from public roads in Rio de Janeiro is governed by Lei nº 5.301 of September 28, 2011, and Decreto nº 36.805 of February 27, 2013. These [3] regulations define abandoned vehicles and the procedures for their removal.

**Alternative Reporting Channels:**
While 1746 is the primary channel, some sources suggest that in certain municipalities, reporting can also be made to the civil police. However [1], for Rio de Janeiro, the 1746 system is consistently highlighted as the official route. The [1] Disque Denúncia (Dial for Reporting) is also mentioned as a channel for reporting various issues in the state of Rio de Janeiro, with specific numbers for the Metropolitan Region and other areas, as well as an app. However [4], the 1746 service is specifically designated for abandoned vehicles within the municipality. [1]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [grupoab.com.br](https://www.grupoab.com.br/blog/noticias/tem-um-carro-abandonado-na-minha-rua,-o-que-eu-faco/)
 - [2] [usezapay.com.br](https://blog.usezapay.com.br/multas/carro-abandonado)
 - [3] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/remocao-de-veiculo-abandonado-em-via-publica/)
 - [4] [justos.com.br](https://www.justos.com.br/blog/carro-abandonado)

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** August 11, 2025

**Research Topic:** How to report a broken traffic signal in Rio de Janeiro.

To report a broken traffic signal in Rio de Janeiro, citizens can utilize several official channels provided by the municipal government. The primary methods include contacting the 1746 service, the Disque-Sinal, or utilizing online platforms and mobile applications.

The 1746 service is a comprehensive citizen service portal for the city of Rio de Janeiro. Broken traffic signals can be reported through the 1746 portal (www.1746.rio) or via the 1746 mobile application, which is available for both Android and iOS devices [1]. Additionally, the 1746 service can be accessed by phone by dialing 1746 within the municipality of Rio de Janeiro, or (21) 3460-1746 from other locations [1]. The 1746 service aims to provide a response within 24 hours for traffic signal repairs [1]. When reporting, it is necessary to provide the names of the streets at the intersection, or the name of the street with the faulty signal and a reference point. It is also important to specify if the entire intersection is out, or if it is just one or more lamps that are not working [1].

Historically, the "Disque-sinal" was established by the Municipal Secretariat of Transport to facilitate the reporting of traffic signal malfunctions. This service could be reached by calling 2508-5500, and it operated 24 hours a day, seven days a week, accepting complaints about issues such as intermittent lights, burnt-out lamps, or damaged signalization [2]. While the Disque-Sinal number is mentioned, the current primary channel appears to be the 1746 service [2].

The Companhia de Engenharia de Tráfego do Rio de Janeiro (CET-Rio) is responsible for traffic engineering and signalization in the city. [2] For issues not covered by the 1746 service, or for more complex matters, citizens can also refer to the CET-Rio's online channels or their physical location for assistance. [2] The CET-Rio's Ouvidoria (Ombudsman's Office) can be contacted for complaints regarding services that were not performed within the expected timeframe or with the desired quality. [2]

The types of traffic signal issues that can be reported include:
*   Crossings where the signal is entirely out. [1]
*   One street of a crossing having its signal out. [1]
*   Pedestrian crossings being out. [1]
*   One or more lamps being burnt out. [1]
*   Signals that are stuck on a single color. [1]
*   Signals flashing yellow. [1]
*   Signals with two or more lights on simultaneously, causing risk. [1]
*   Damaged, missing, or turned signal arms or posts. [1]
*   Signal controller boxes with open doors, or damaged/fallen boxes. [1]
*   Broken or missing signal pole caps and exposed signal cables. [1]

The 1746 service is updated as of March 26, 2024, and the Disque-Sinal information dates back to April 30, 2008. [2]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/reparo-de-sinal-de-transito-apagado-ou-em-amarelo-piscante/)
 - [2] [rio.rj.gov.br](http://www0.rio.rj.gov.br/pcrj/destaques/servicos/destaque_disquesinal.shtm)

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** August 11, 2025

**Research Topic:** How to request a replacement stop sign from the Rio de Janeiro city hall.

To request the replacement or maintenance of a stop sign ("placa de Pare") in Rio de Janeiro, citizens can utilize the city's official service channels. The primary platform for such requests is the **Portal 1746** [1].

The **Companhia de Engenharia de Tráfego (CET-Rio)** is responsible for the implementation and maintenance of traffic signage, including stop signs. [2]

**Methods for Requesting Service:**

1.  **Portal 1746 / Carioca Digital:** Requests can be formally submitted through the **Portal 1746** or the **Carioca Digital** portal. [1] This often involves accessing a service request form where users can detail the issue.
2.  **1746 Phone Line:** Citizens can also contact the Central de Atendimento 1746 by phone. It is important to note that calls to 1746 and (21) 3460-1746 are charged at the rate of a landline call. [1]
3.  **1746 WhatsApp:** The service can also be requested via WhatsApp at (21) 3460-1746. [1]
4.  **1746 Mobile App:** An application named "1746 Rio" is available for smartphones (Android and iOS) and allows citizens to request services and track their progress. [1]
5.  **Regional Administrations:** If unable to access the Central de Atendimento 1746 through other means, requests can be made in person at a Regional Administration office. [1]

**Information Required for the Request:**

When submitting a request, it is crucial to provide specific details to ensure efficient processing:

*   **State of the Signage:** Describe the condition of the stop sign, noting if it is fallen, turned, damaged, vandalized, rusted, dirty, illegible, or missing. [3]
*   **Type of Sign:** Specify that it is a "placa de Pare". [3]
*   **Location Details:** Provide the name of the streets at the intersection or the street name and numerical reference if it's not an intersection. [3]
*   **Previous Signage:** Indicate if a sign previously existed at the location. [3] If no sign has ever been present, a different service type for "Implantação de sinalização gráfica vertical viária" may apply.

**Service [3] Timelines:**

The expected timeframe for the maintenance and repair of traffic signage is typically within **7 business days**. For the [2] installation of new traffic signs, a study may be required, and the process can take longer, with an estimated 20 days for analysis and project elaboration for indicative service signage.

**Exclusions [1]:**

It is important to note that CET-Rio is responsible for traffic signage. Placas for street identification (street names), or signs like "proibido jogar lixo" (no littering), are not within CET-Rio's purview. [2]

task_data.prompt: minha rua virou pista de corrida. como eu faço um abaixo assinado ou pedido pra colocarem quebra mola aqui?
task_data.golden_answer:
*Requerimento para implantação de quebra-molas* no Portal Carioca Digital: acesse https://carioca.rio/servicos/informacoes-sobre-implantacao-de-quebra-molas/ e clique em “Acessar o serviço” para preencher o formulário online com sua Identidade Carioca ou Gov.Br. *Prazo:* até 20 dias para análise e sinalização.
 
 *Documentos obrigatórios:*
 
 * Requerimento do representante local com cópia de identidade, telefone e comprovante de residência.
 * Abaixo-assinado original com assinatura legível de 2/3 dos moradores da via.

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Para solicitar a instalação de um quebra-molas na sua rua, o processo na Prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro é o seguinte:

1.  *Formalize o Pedido:*
    Acesse o *Portal 1746* ou ligue para a *Central 1746*. Você também pode usar o *Portal Carioca Digital* para o serviço "Requerimento para implantação de quebra-molas".

2.  *Documentos Necessários:*
    -   Pedido formal de um representante da comunidade local (com cópia do RG, contato e comprovante de residência).
    -   *Abaixo-assinado original* com a assinatura de pelo menos 2/3 das unidades residenciais da rua, com nomes e endereços legíveis.
    -   Documento original de "Nada a Opor" do batalhão da Polícia Militar da sua área.
    -   Informações detalhadas do local: *nome da rua, número e ponto de referência*.

3.  *Processo de Análise:*
    Seu pedido será avaliado pela CET-Rio em até 30 dias. Se a avaliação for favorável, a solicitação é encaminhada para a SECONSERVA para execução, o que pode levar até 20 dias para análise, projeto e instalação da sinalização.

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** August 11, 2025

**Research Topic:** Solicitar quebra-mola (speed bump) from the Rio de Janeiro City Hall.

To request the installation of a speed bump (quebra-mola) in Rio de Janeiro, the process involves a formal request that is initially directed to the CET-Rio (Companhia de Engenharia de Tráfego do Rio de Janeiro) for technical evaluation. [1] The request is then internally forwarded to the Secretaria de Conservação (SECONSERVA) for approval, project development, and eventual installation, including signage.

 [1]**Procedure for Requesting a Speed Bump:**

1.  **Initial Request:** The request must be formalized. While some sources suggest attending a Subprefeitura (Sub-prefecture) of the relevant area, others [2] indicate that the initial solicitation is made via the 1746 service, either by phone or through the 1746 Rio application. The [1] Portal Carioca Digital also offers a service for the "Requerimento para implantação de quebra-molas".
2.  [1] **Information Required:**
    *   A formal request from a local community representative, including a copy of their identity document, contact phone number, and proof of residence in the area where the speed bump is requested.
    [2] *   An original petition signed by at least two-thirds of the residential units on the intended street, with legible names and addresses.
    [2] *   An original "NADA OPOR" (no objection) document from the Military Police battalion with jurisdiction over the area.
    [2] *   Details such as the street name, number, and a reference point.

**Process [1] and Timeline:**

*   The demand is first directed to CET-Rio for evaluation, which has a prazo of up to 30 days for its technical assessment.
*   [1] If CET-Rio's technical assessment is favorable, the request is transferred internally to SECONSERVA for the execution of the work.
*   [1] The estimated timeframe for analysis, project development, and vertical signage installation is up to 20 days after the request is submitted.

It [2] is important to note that the direct request for the *removal or adaptation* of an existing speed bump also follows a similar evaluation process by CET-Rio, and is not a direct citizen request for immediate action. Irregular [1] speed bumps (those without official publication in the Diário Oficial) are subject to removal by SECONSERVA. [3]

**Sources:**

task_data.prompt: a faixa de pedestre aqui em frente de casa apagou toda. tem como pedir pra virem pintar de novo? é perigoso atravessar.
task_data.golden_answer:
Para solicitar a repintura da faixa de pedestres apagada:
 
 * Acesse o *Portal Rio 1746* no link abaixo (copie e cole no navegador):
  https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10873449649051-Manuten%C3%A7%C3%A3o-de-sinaliza%C3%A7%C3%A3o-gr%C3%A1fica-horizontal-vi%C3%A1ria
 * Clique em “Entrar e solicitar” ou em “Solicitar Anonimamente”
 * Informe:
 
  * Nome da rua (ou ruas do cruzamento) e ponto de referência
  * Se houve recape total ou só tapa-buracos
  * Se a pintura está desgastada ou totalmente apagada
  * Tipo de sinalização: faixa de pedestre
 * Prazo de resposta: *até 14 dias corridos*

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Sim, você pode solicitar a repintura da faixa de pedestres. Esse serviço é chamado de *Manutenção de sinalização gráfica horizontal viária*.

Para fazer a solicitação, você deve entrar em contato com a Prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro através do *Portal 1746*:

*   Acesse o site *1746.rio*.
*   Procure pelo serviço de *Manutenção de sinalização gráfica horizontal viária* ou *Pinturas de sinalização no pavimento das ruas*.
*   Você pode fazer a solicitação com seu login ou de forma *anônima*.

Ao registrar seu pedido, forneça os seguintes detalhes para ajudar a equipe:
*   Nome da rua, com número ou ponto de referência.
*   Informar se a pintura já existia no local.
*   Detalhes sobre o estado da pintura (apagada ou desbotada).
*   Especificar que se trata de uma *faixa de pedestres*.

A Companhia de Engenharia de Tráfego (CET-Rio) é a responsável por esse serviço. O prazo estimado para resposta é de até *14 dias corridos*.

**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** August 11, 2025

**Research Topic:** Solicitar pintura de faixa de pedestre no Rio de Janeiro

To request the painting or maintenance of pedestrian crossings in Rio de Janeiro, citizens can utilize the official services provided by the municipality, primarily through the Portal Rio 1746 [1]. The relevant service is categorized under "Manutenção de sinalização gráfica horizontal viária" or "Pinturas de sinalização no pavimento das ruas".

**Procedure [1] for Requesting Maintenance:**

1.  **Access the Service:** Requests can be made via the Portal Rio 1746, either by logging in with user credentials or by submitting the request anonymously. The Portal [1] Carioca Digital also provides access to services related to traffic and signage, including horizontal graphic signaling.
2.  **Provide [2] Necessary Information:** When submitting a request for the maintenance of pedestrian crossing paintings, the following details are required:
    *   The name of the street(s) involved, including intersection details if applicable, or the street name with reference points.
    *  [1]  Information on whether the painting previously existed at the location.
    *  [1]  Details regarding recent asphalt work, such as whether the entire street was repaved or only potholes were patched.
    *  [1]  A description of the condition of the existing painting, specifying if it is worn out or completely faded.
    *  [1]  The type of marking in question, confirming it is a pedestrian crossing.
3.  **Collaboration [1] for Planning:** For citizens wishing to contribute to the operational planning of road marking implementation, it is essential to specify the type of signaling suggested, the street name, and a reference number in the request description.

**Important [3] Considerations:**

*   The described service is specifically for the *maintenance* of existing pavement markings. It does not apply to the *implementation of new signage*, which requires project elaboration and takes longer.
*   The [1] expected response time for maintenance requests is up to 14 calendar days.
*   The [1] Companhia de Engenharia de Tráfego (CET-Rio) is responsible for the implementation of horizontal graphic road signaling, including pedestrian crossings, based on operational planning and citizen suggestions after a site inspection and project approval. [3]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [1746.rio](https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10873449649051-Manuten%C3%A7%C3%A3o-de-sinaliza%C3%A7%C3%A3o-gr%C3%A1fica-horizontal-vi%C3%A1ria)

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact: Online Registration of Traffic Accidents Without Victims in Rio de Janeiro**

The procedure for registering a traffic accident without victims online in Rio de Janeiro is primarily handled through the e-BRAT system, managed by the State Military Police (PMERJ) [1]. This online service allows citizens to report accidents that do not involve injuries and occur on state roads [1].

**Key Information and Steps:**

*   **Service Name:** e-BRAT (Boletim de Registro de Acidente de Trânsito sem Vítimas).
 [1]*   **Eligibility:** The service is available for all citizens residing in the State of Rio de Janeiro who were involved in an accident without victims, occurring on a state road. It [1] is not applicable for accidents with victims or those occurring on federal highways.
 [2]*   **Accessing the Service:** To register an accident, individuals must access the official e-BRAT website: http://ebrat.pmerj.rj.gov.br/brat/.
 [1]*   **Process:**
    1.  Visit the e-BRAT website and agree to the instructions to proceed with the registration.
 [1]    2.  Respond to a series of questions related to the accident to initiate the "Registro de Acidentes de Trânsito sem Vítimas".
   [1]  3.  After submitting the information, the PMERJ will validate it, and the BRAT (Boletim de Registro de Acidente de Trânsito) will be made available for online printing.
*   [3] **Timeframe for Registration:** Citizens have up to 90 days after the accident to complete the e-BRAT registration.
*   [1] **Cost:** The service is free of charge.
*   [1] **Consultation:** It is also possible to consult the status of a registered e-BRAT by visiting https://sepm.rj.gov.br/ and navigating to "Para o Cidadão" > "E-brat Registro e Consulta," requiring the protocol number of the registration.

task_data.prompt: quero trabalhar com van escolar. o que eu preciso pra conseguir a autorização da prefeitura? o carro tem que ter o que?
task_data.golden_answer:
*Para autorização*:
 
 * Cópia da identidade, CPF, CNH categoria D, comprovante de inscrição no INSS como motorista, comprovante de residência no Município do Rio de Janeiro, certidões negativas da 2ª Vara Cível e da Justiça Federal, declaração de local de guarda dos veículos, requerimento à SMTR com telefone e e-mail, documento do veículo em nome do requerente, atestado médico de não portar doença infectocontagiosa, CSV (se houve alteração) e apólice de seguro em favor de terceiros
  Link direto: https://carioca.rio/servicos/autorizacao-para-transporte-escolar-abertura-de-termo/
 
 *Para inclusão de veículo*:
 
 * Requerimento assinado, cópia da identidade, CRLV em nome do requerente (ou CRV/nota fiscal), apólice de seguro (Danos Materiais R\$ 25.000, APP R\$ 5.000 por passageiro) e CSV (se alterado)
  Link direto: https://carioca.rio/servicos/inclusao-de-veiculos-em-modais-de-transporte/
 
 *Veículo*:
 
 * Placa vermelha; faixa amarela de 40 cm nas laterais e traseira com “ESCOLAR” em preto; número de autorização fixado; selo de vistoria; cartão de identificação no para-brisa; tacógrafo aferido; CNH D válida; CRLV atualizado; idade máxima de 7 anos para vans

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Para trabalhar com van escolar no Rio de Janeiro, você precisa de autorização da *Secretaria Municipal de Transportes (SMTR)*.

Veja o que é necessário para o *condutor* (Pessoa Física):
- *CNH Categoria D* com anotação de atividade remunerada.
- Comprovante de inscrição no *INSS*.
- Certidões negativas criminais.
- Comprovante de residência no Rio.
- Atestado médico de saúde.
- Seguro em favor de terceiros.

Para o *veículo*, são exigidos:
- Placa vermelha.
- Faixa amarela de 40 cm nas laterais e traseira, com a palavra *ESCOLAR* em preto.
- Número de autorização oficial visível.
- Selo de vistoria anual.
- *CRLV* e *CSV* (se houver modificações).
- Certificado de aferição do tacógrafo.

O veículo passa por vistorias obrigatórias a cada seis meses. Para a vistoria, você precisa apresentar:
- Comprovante do agendamento.
- Comprovante de pagamento do *DARM*.
- *CRLV* atualizado.
- *CNH Categoria D*.

Você pode obter mais informações e detalhes completos sobre a documentação e o processo no *Portal Carioca Digital* ou ligando para o *1746*.

Gostaria de saber mais sobre como agendar a vistoria do veículo?

**Research Artifact: Requirements for School Van Authorization in Rio de Janeiro**

**Date of Search:** August 11, 2025

To obtain authorization for operating a school van (van escolar) in the Municipality of Rio de Janeiro, applicants must meet specific requirements related to both the operator and the vehicle, ensuring compliance with regulations set forth by the Municipal Secretariat of Transport (SMTR) [1]. The SMTR is responsible for the accreditation of transport vehicles and their drivers to guarantee student safety [1].

**Operator Requirements (Pessoa Física):**

Individuals seeking authorization must submit the following documentation:
*   An authenticated copy of their identity, CPF (Cadastro de Pessoas Físicas), and CNH (Carteira Nacional de Habilitação) with Category "D".
*  [1]  Proof of registration as a driver with the INSS (Instituto Nacional do Seguro Social).
*  [1]  Proof of payment of the Union Contribution (Contribuição Sindical).
*   An [1] authenticated copy of a proof of residence in the Municipality of Rio de Janeiro, no older than three months, either in the applicant's name or accompanied by a declaration with a notarized signature.
*   Originals [1] of Negative Certificates from the 1st, 2nd, 3rd, and 4th Civil Registry Offices of Distribution (Criminal).
*   A [1] contact phone number.
*   A [1] certificate of no criminal record from the Federal Justice.
*   Documentation [1] proving the vehicle's storage location, which can be a proof of residence or a declaration.
*   A [1] formal application addressed to the SMTR.
*   An [1] authenticated copy of the vehicle's documentation, registered in the applicant's name.
*   A [1] medical certificate confirming the applicant does not possess any infectious-contagious diseases.
*   A [1] CSV (Certificado de Segurança Veicular) if the vehicle has undergone modifications to comply with Decree 11519/92.
*   Proof [1] of insurance in favor of third parties, in the applicant's name, with specified coverage amounts for death (R$ 5,000.00 per passenger), permanent disability (R$ 5,000.00 per passenger), and material damage (minimum R$ 25,000.00).
*   Proof [1] of payment for the vehicle's mandatory insurance (DPVAT - Seguro de Danos Pessoais causados por Veículos Automotores).
*   A 5x7 [1] photograph of the driver for the creation of the CIAT (Cartão de Identificação de Auxiliar de Transporte).

**Operator [1] Requirements (Pessoa Jurídica):**

Legal entities must provide:
*   An application on official letterhead addressed to the SMTR.
*   An authenticated [1] copy of the Company Social Contract and any amendments.
*   Registration [1] with the Secretariat of Education, if applicable.
*   A simple [1] copy of the CNPJ (Cadastro Nacional da Pessoa Jurídica).
*   A Business [1] License (Alvará de Licença).

**Vehicle Requirements [1]:**

The vehicle intended for school transport must meet the following criteria:
*   It must be registered as a passenger vehicle.
*   It is subject [2] to mandatory inspections every six months to verify safety items, including the tachograph.
*   Vehicles must [1] display a red license plate.
*   A yellow stripe [1], 40 cm wide, must run along the entire length of the vehicle's sides and rear, with the word "ESCOLAR" in black.
*   The official [1] authorization number must be clearly displayed on the vehicle.
*   An annual [1] inspection sticker must be affixed to the vehicle.
*   The Operator [1]/Auxiliary Identification Card must be visible, typically near the windshield.
*   The vehicle [1]'s Certificate of Registration and Licensing (CRLV) must be current.
*   A valid Certificate [1] of Tachograph Calibration is required.
*   Vehicles may [1] have age restrictions; for instance, after twelve years and up to sixteen years of age, an additional INMETRO inspection is necessary, resulting in a technical report valid for one year.

**Vistoria (Inspection [3]) Documentation:**

To undergo the mandatory vehicle inspection, applicants must present:
*   Proof of the scheduled inspection.
*   Proof of payment [1] for the Municipal Collection Document (DARM) for the current year, with payment made at least five business days prior.
*   An up-to-date [1] certificate of tachograph calibration.
*   A current [1] CRLV.
*   A valid CNH [1] Category D for the operator or auxiliary, indicating they engage in remunerated activity.
*   A regular [1] Cadastral Situation Report, obtainable from the SMTR's online portal.
*   A certificate [1] of course completion.

The process for [1] obtaining authorization and maintaining compliance involves regular updates and adherence to the regulations established by the Prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro and the SMTR. Information and [1] services related to school transport authorization can be accessed through the Portal Carioca Digital and the 1746 service. [4]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [prefeitura.rio](https://transportes.prefeitura.rio/transporte-escolar/)
 - [2] [escolartransporte.com.br](https://www.escolartransporte.com.br/informacoes-uteis/como-legalizar-um-transporte-escolar/)
 - [3] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/servicos/autorizacao-para-transporte-escolar-abertura-de-termo/)
 - [4] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/grupo/permissao-de-transporte-escolar/)

task_data.prompt: tenho uma van e quero fazer transporte de funcionario pra uma empresa. qual a licença que eu preciso tirar?

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Para fazer o transporte de funcionários para uma empresa com sua van, você precisa de uma licença de *transporte fretamento*.

Este serviço é regulado pela *Secretaria Municipal de Transportes (SMTR)* do Rio de Janeiro.

*Importante:* Geralmente, a licença de fretamento é concedida para *pessoas jurídicas* (empresas, cooperativas). Como pessoa física, você precisaria estar vinculado a uma entidade jurídica registrada para operar.

Caso você seja uma pessoa jurídica ou se vincule a uma, alguns requisitos comuns incluem:
- Sua empresa deve ter o transporte de passageiros como objetivo social.
- CNPJ e alvará do estabelecimento.
- Comprovante de propriedade ou posse do veículo.
- Veículo com categoria "aluguel" no CRLV e no máximo 15 anos de fabricação.
- Motorista com CNH categoria D e EAR (Exerce Atividade Remunerada).
- Seguros obrigatórios (DPVAT, Responsabilidade Civil, Acidentes de Passageiros).

Para mais informações e para iniciar o processo, você pode consultar o Portal Carioca Digital ou o *1746.rio*.

content.name: google_search
content.arguments: {'query': 'licença transporte de funcionários van Rio de Janeiro'}

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact**

**Date of Search:** August 11, 2025

The licensing and regulation of van transport for employees in Rio de Janeiro are overseen by municipal and state authorities, depending on the service's operational scope. Within the municipality of Rio de Janeiro, the **Secretaria Municipal de Transportes (SMTR)** is the primary regulatory body, with processes often facilitated through the **Portal Carioca Digital** and the **1746.rio** platform [1]. For transport services that extend beyond the city limits, the **Departamento Estadual de Transportes Rodoviários (DETRO-RJ)**, a state agency, holds regulatory authority. [2]

The relevant service category for transporting employees is typically "transporte fretamento" (chartered transport), which is also used for tourism and events. [1] This service is generally restricted to legal entities such as companies, associations, or cooperatives. Individuals are typically not permitted to operate this service independently unless they are formally affiliated with a registered legal entity. [3]

**Licensing and Documentation for Municipal Transport (within Rio de Janeiro):**

Companies seeking authorization for chartered transport within the city of Rio de Janeiro must typically complete an "Abertura de Termo" (Opening of Term) process, often initiated via the Portal Carioca Digital. [1] The application process for legal entities generally requires the submission of several documents:

*   A formal application ("Requerimento"). [3]
*   The company's social contract ("Contrato Social"), which must clearly state passenger transport as a business objective, along with any registered amendments. [3]
*   A valid CNPJ (Cadastro Nacional de Pessoa Jurídica).
 [3]*   An establishment permit ("Alvará do estabelecimento").
* [3]   Proof of vehicle ownership or lease, such as the CRV (Certificado de Registro do Veículo) or CRLV (Certificado de Registro e Licenciamento do Veículo).
*   [3] Evidence of property ownership or a lease agreement for a business location within the municipality of Rio de Janeiro.
*   [3] Company logos, usually with specified dimensions.
*   [3] Photographs of the vehicle, showcasing all angles.
*   [3] A "Nada Consta da SMTR" certificate, confirming the absence of outstanding fines issued by the SMTR.
*   [3] Appropriate insurance coverage, including Civil Liability for third-party damages (with minimums of R$ 25,000.00 for material damages and R$ 25,000.00 for personal damages) and Passenger Accident Insurance (with a minimum of R$ 5,000.00 per passenger).

For [3] individuals associated with cooperatives, additional documentation may be necessary, such as proof of registration with the INSS (Instituto Nacional do Seguro Social) as an autonomous driver and evidence of union contribution payments.

**Vehicle [4] Requirements:**

Vehicles utilized for chartered transport must adhere to specific regulations. For vans, the maximum age is generally set at 15 years from the manufacturing date. The [4] vehicle's CRLV must list its category as "aluguel" (rental). Furthermore [3], vehicles must possess valid mandatory insurance (DPVAT) and civil liability insurance.

**Driver [3] Requirements:**

Drivers are required to hold a valid CNH (Carteira Nacional de Habilitação) with at least a Category D, which indicates the authorization for remunerated activity. In some [1] cases, a certificate of completion for a specialized course in collective transport may also be required for both the driver and any auxiliary staff.

**Inter [1]-municipal and Inter-state Transport:**

For transportation services that operate across municipal or state boundaries, authorization from DETRO-RJ is mandatory. This involves [2] obtaining a specific license for the intended routes and ensuring that vehicles comply with DETRO-RJ's regulations, including age restrictions (e.g., vans originally manufactured for passenger transport typically have a maximum age of 13 years) and proper registration.

The chartered [2] transport service is generally limited to point-to-point routes designated for tourism and events. It is not permissible to pick up or drop off passengers along the route in a manner similar to regular public transportation. Companies [2] providing employee transport must ensure their operations align with these regulations, as the service is primarily intended for groups with a contractual relationship with the service provider. [2]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/grupo/autorizacao-para-transporte-fretamento/)
 - [2] [www.gov.br](https://www.gov.br/antt/pt-br/assuntos/passageiros/transporte-interestadual-de-fretamento)
 - [3] [1746.rio](https://www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/10871328761115-Informa%C3%A7%C3%B5es-sobre-o-servi%C3%A7o-de-transporte-fretamento-turismo-eventos)
 - [4] [alerj.rj.gov.br](http://www3.alerj.rj.gov.br/lotus_notes/default.asp?id=3&url=L3NjcHJvMTkyMy5uc2YvMGM1YmY1Y2RlOTU2MDFmOTAzMjU2Y2FhMDAyMzEzMWIvNmI0MTViMTljZDRlMjdkNjAzMjU4ODlmMDA1ODM1ZDU/T3BlbkRvY3VtZW50)

task_data.prompt: quero começar a rodar de uber. é verdade que precisa se cadastrar na prefeitura? como faz isso?
task_data.golden_answer:
Sim, para rodar de Uber na cidade é obrigatório credenciar-se junto à Prefeitura (SMTR) – *o credenciamento é gratuito e válido por 12 meses* Você pode:
 
 * Pela internet: acesse https://carioca.rio/servicos, faça login com Identidade Carioca ou conta Gov.Br, busque “Credenciamento de motoristas de aplicativos”, clique em ACESSAR O SERVIÇO e preencha o formulário.
 
 * Presencialmente: compareça a um posto de atendimento da SMTR (consulte endereços em https://transportes.prefeitura.rio).
 
 Mais detalhes: https://prefeitura.rio/transportes/prefeitura-do-rio-publica-regras-de-credenciamento-de-aplicativos-e-motoristas

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Sim, para rodar de Uber no Rio de Janeiro, há um processo de credenciamento que envolve a Prefeitura.

Embora a Uber e outras plataformas façam o cadastro inicial dos motoristas, a Prefeitura do Rio exige um *credenciamento público* das plataformas e dos motoristas.

*Como funciona:*
- As plataformas (como Uber) precisam estar credenciadas junto à Prefeitura.
- Elas enviam mensalmente à Secretaria Municipal de Transportes (SMTR) os dados dos motoristas parceiros, veículos e valores de corridas.
- Os motoristas, por sua vez, podem precisar passar por um processo de *credenciamento gratuito* junto à Prefeitura. Esse credenciamento pode ser feito online ou em um ponto de atendimento da SMTR. A validade do credencial geralmente acompanha a da sua CNH.

*Requisitos gerais para motoristas:*
- Ter Carteira Nacional de Habilitação (CNH) com a observação *Exerce Atividade Remunerada (EAR)*.
- Pelo menos um ano de experiência com a CNH.
- Veículo que atenda aos critérios (quatro portas, ar condicionado, idade máxima).
- Certificado de Registro e Licenciamento do Veículo (CRLV) em dia.

A Prefeitura busca regulamentar o serviço para garantir a segurança e a qualidade do transporte.

Para mais detalhes sobre o credenciamento de motoristas, você pode consultar o site da *Prefeitura do Rio*, na seção de transportes.

Posso te ajudar com alguma outra dúvida sobre o credenciamento ou os requisitos?

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact: Cadastro Uber Prefeitura Rio de Janeiro**

**Date of Search:** August 11, 2025

The Rio de Janeiro Prefecture mandates a public accreditation process for ride-sharing platforms, including Uber, to ensure legal operation within the city [1]. This process requires companies to provide monthly data to the Municipal Secretariat of Transport (SMTR), encompassing driver details, vehicle information, and financial transaction summaries [1].

**Platform Obligations:**
Ride-sharing companies operating in Rio de Janeiro must obtain public accreditation from the Prefecture [1]. As part of this accreditation, they are obligated to submit monthly reports to the SMTR. These reports include:
*   The full name and valid driver's license (CNH) number of their partner drivers [1].
*   The license plate numbers of vehicles used for at least one trip within the municipality in the preceding month [1].
*   The total amount charged to passengers for trips completed by their registered drivers [1].
*   A declaration confirming compliance with all requirements stipulated in relevant municipal decrees, such as Decree No. 48.612 of March 15, 2021 [1].

Furthermore, platforms are required to pay a fee of 1.5% on the total amount charged to passengers. This fee is designated for the maintenance of public roads and the Municipal Fund for Sustainable Urban Mobility [2].

**Driver Requirements and Credentialing:**
While Uber handles much of the driver vetting, municipal regulations also influence driver eligibility and processes. Key requirements for drivers generally include:
*   A valid Carteira Nacional de Habilitação (CNH) with the "Exerce Atividade Remunerada" (EAR) annotation.
 [3]*   At least one year of driving experience with their CNH.
 [3]*   An eligible vehicle that meets specific criteria, which typically include having four doors, air conditioning, and a maximum age of 8 to 10 years, depending on the source and specific regulations.
 [3]*   A current Certificate of Registration and Licensing of Vehicle (CRLV) for the vehicle used.
 [3]*   Uber also conducts its own safety evaluations, which involve verifying the legitimacy of submitted documents and checking for criminal records.
 [3]
Drivers may also be required to undergo a free credentialing process with the prefecture, with the credential's validity typically matching that of their CNH. This [3] credentialing can be completed either online or at an SMTR service point.
 [3]
The Prefecture of Rio de Janeiro also operates its own mobility applications, such as Taxi.Rio for taxis and Moto.Rio for mototaxis, aiming to regulate and improve urban transport services within the city. [1]

**Sources:**
 - [1] [prefeitura.rio](https://prefeitura.rio/cidade/uber-e-99-realizam-credenciamento-publico-junto-a-prefeitura-do-rio/)
 - [2] [diariodotransporte.com.br](https://diariodotransporte.com.br/2017/08/14/prefeitura-do-rio-inicia-pre-cadastro-de-aplicativo-para-taxis/)
 - [3] [prefeitura.rio](https://prefeitura.rio/transportes/prefeitura-do-rio-publica-regras-de-credenciamento-de-aplicativos-e-motoristas/)

Olá! Você pode denunciar vans piratas e transporte irregular através da *Central 1746*, o canal oficial da Prefeitura do Rio de Janeiro.

*Canais para denúncia:*
- *Telefone:* Ligue para *1746* (dentro do Rio) ou *(21) 3460-1746* (fora do Rio).
- *Site:* Acesse www.1746.rio.
- *Aplicativo:* Baixe o app "1746 Rio".
- *WhatsApp:* O 1746 também atende via WhatsApp.

Sua denúncia pode ser feita de forma *totalmente anônima*.

*Para ajudar na fiscalização, inclua:*
- Data e hora do incidente.
- Local (endereço ou ponto de referência).
- Identificação do veículo (placa, se possível).
- Descrição detalhada da irregularidade.

A *Secretaria Municipal de Transportes (SMTR)* e a *Secretaria Municipal de Ordem Pública (SEOP)* são as responsáveis pela fiscalização.

tool_return.text:
**Research Artifact**

**Topic:** How to report irregular transportation in Rio de Janeiro.
**Date of Search:** August 11, 2025

To report irregular transportation services within the municipality of Rio de Janeiro, citizens can utilize the **Central de Atendimento 1746**, which serves as the primary channel for various municipal services, including transportation-related complaints [1]. The 1746 service is accessible through multiple platforms:

*   **Telephone:** Dial 1746 within the municipality of Rio de Janeiro. For calls originating from outside the municipality, the number is (21) 3460-1746 [1].
*   **Website:** The official portal for the 1746 service is www.1746.rio [1].
*   **Mobile Application:** The "1746 Rio" application allows citizens to access information and submit service requests [1].
*   **WhatsApp:** The Central 1746 also facilitates reporting via WhatsApp [1].

Reports can be submitted anonymously, and the municipality guarantees the confidentiality of the reporter's identity, prohibiting retaliation against those who report in good faith [2].

**Types of Irregularities that can be Reported:**

The 1746 service and associated municipal secretariats address a range of transportation irregularities, including:

*   **General Irregular Transportation:** This covers any transport services operating outside of established regulations [1].
*   **Clandestine or "Pirate" Transportation:** This includes vehicles operating without the necessary municipal authorization, often referred to as "pirate" services [1].
*   **Taxi Irregularities:** Complaints can be lodged regarding taxi services, such as vehicles in poor condition, improper driver conduct, or unauthorized operations [1].
*   **Bus Services:** Reports can be made concerning the condition of buses, including mechanical issues, malfunctioning equipment (e.g., validators, accessibility elevators), overcrowding, or failure to meet technical standards [3]. Irregularities in bus line operations, such as service scarcity, inconsistent intervals, improper passenger pick-ups, failure to adhere to schedules, or the use of inappropriate vehicle types (e.g., micro-buses on routes designated for larger buses), are also reportable [1]. Specific issues like buses operating with the air conditioning turned off are also addressed [1].
*   **BRT (Bus Rapid Transit):** Problems encountered on the Transbrasil corridor, such as mechanical or technical failures, delays, or overcrowding, can be reported through the 1746 system [4].
*   **Fretamento (Chartered Transport):** Irregularities related to chartered transport services, including vehicle condition, driver behavior, and unauthorized operations, can be reported [5].

**Information Required for Reporting:**

To ensure effective investigation and resolution, it is recommended to provide specific details when filing a report [2]:

*   The **date and time** of the incident [2].
*   The **location** where the irregularity occurred [2].
*   **Vehicle identification:** This may include the license plate number, the bus line number, or the vehicle's order number [2].
*   A **detailed description** of the specific irregularity or problem encountered [2].
*   For taxi-related complaints, providing the **phone number** used to request the service can be beneficial [5].

The Municipal Secretariat of Transport (SMTR) and the Municipal Secretariat of Public Order (SEOP) are the primary bodies responsible for investigating and acting upon these reports, aiming to enhance the safety and quality of public transportation in Rio de Janeiro [1].

For issues pertaining to inter-municipal transport, the State Agency for Land Transportation (DETRO) offers its own reporting channels, including a mobile application named "Fiscal do Bolso" and a dedicated WhatsApp number [1]. However, for transportation services operating strictly within the municipality, the 1746 service is the designated reporting mechanism.

**Sources:**
 - [1] [carioca.rio](https://carioca.rio/grupo/fiscalizacao-de-transporte-irregular/)
 - [2] [rio.rj.gov.br](http://www.rio.rj.gov.br/web/guest/exibeconteudo?id=8170951)
 - [3] [prefeitura.rio](https://transportes.prefeitura.rio/atendimentodigital/)
 - [4] [aemerj.org.br](https://www.aemerj.org.br/index.php/194-detro-lanca-aplicativo-para-denuncia-pelo-celular)
 - [5] [Current time information in Rio de Janeiro, BR.](https://www.google.com/search?q=time+in+Rio+de+Janeiro,+BR)

task_data.prompt: sou taxista e minha autonomia vai vencer. o que eu preciso fazer pra renovar o alvará?
task_data.golden_answer:
*Para renovar seu alvará*:
 
 * Acesse o serviço de Vistoria Anual em Transporte Táxi no Portal Carioca Digital: https://carioca.rio/servicos/vistoria-anual-em-transporte-taxi/
 * Faça login com Identidade Carioca ou conta Gov.Br.
 * Emita a guia DARM de *Vistoria Anual*, agende a vistoria e pague a taxa.
 * Compareça na data marcada no posto (Estrada do Guerenguê, 1.630 – Taquara) com:
 
  * CRLV atualizado
  * CNH válida com informação de atividade remunerada
  * Laudo de Situação Cadastral (http://sgtu.rio.rj.gov.br/portalsmtr/index)
  * Certificado de aferição do taxímetro (IPEM)
  * Apólice de seguro (R\$ 5 000 pessoal; R\$ 25 000 material)
 * Em até 48 h, seu novo CIAT (alvará) será emitido.

one_turn_analysis.agent_message:
Olá! Para renovar seu alvará de taxista no Rio, siga estes passos:

1.  *Peticionamento Eletrônico (Online):*
    *   Acesse o Portal Carioca Digital: carioca.rio/servicos/vistoria-anual-em-transporte-taxi/
    *   Faça login com Identidade Carioca ou Gov.Br.
    *   Selecione o serviço ("Vistoria atrasada", "Vistoria regular" ou "Atualização documental").
    *   Preencha com o número da sua permissão e placa do veículo.
    *   Anexe os documentos em PDF (máx. 10Mb).
    *   Envie a solicitação.

2.  *Atendimento Presencial:*
    *   Agende um horário neste link: https://sgtu.rio.rj.gov.br/AgendarVistoriaSMTR/Index
    *   Compareça no dia e hora agendados com a confirmação e todos os documentos.

*Documentos necessários (geralmente):*
- Comprovante de pagamento do DARM da Vistoria Anual.
- Comprovante de residência (últimos 90 dias).
- CRLV atualizado do veículo.
- CNH com EAR (Exerce Atividade Remunerada) válida.
- Certificado de aferição do taxímetro (IPEM/RJ).
- Certificado do curso de taxista (válido por 5 anos).
- Apólice de seguro de responsabilidade civil para terceiros.
- Certidão negativa do 2º Ofício de Distribuição.

Para mais detalhes, acesse: www.1746.rio/hc/pt-br/articles/26079497682843-Informa%C3%A7%C3%B5es-sobre-autoriza%C3%A7%C3%A3o-de-t%C3%A1xi-ou-motot%C3%A1xi-para-motoristas-auxiliares
